Infantometer (Machine used for measuring length of small babies), weighing machine, Stadiometer (Machine used for measuring height in children) etc","lang-hi-name":"अभिभावक-शिक्षक बैठक आयोजित करती है","lang-hi-description":"अभिभावक-शिक्षक बैठक आयोजित करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Measures height and weight of children","description":"Measures the height and weight of children with  standard procedures-Measures the length of children with standard procedures-Confirms the length and if there is a difference between the two readings, then measures the child for the third time to confirm the actual length","lang-hi-name":"बच्चों की लंबाई और वजन मापती है","lang-hi-description":"बच्चों की लंबाई और वजन मापती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Counsels ","description":"Leads activities for advocacy, awareness generation and involvement of parents -Clarifies needs to support the child's learning and development at home and in the AWC-Counsels  the parents of the child that their child's height is less for his age (growth is slow)-Counsels the parents to monitor the child's progress monthly-Monitors child in the green zone/normal, then congratulates the parents and asks them to continue feeding the child well and ensures sanitation and hygiene","lang-hi-name":"परामर्श ","lang-hi-description":"परामर्श "}]

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Understands THR, HCM, growth monitoring and referral","description":"Is aware of Beneficiaries (3-6 years) in catchment area-Understands THR related issues-Understands growth monitoring related issues (functionality of GMDs, availability and usage of growth monitoring charts, referral of severe undernourished children with complications to the NRC, community-based management of moderate malnourished children and NRC returned children etc.)-Understands referral related issues faced by the beneficiaries (Family and health service related issues)","lang-hi-name":"THR, HCM, वृद्धि निगरानी और रेफरल को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"THR, HCM, वृद्धि निगरानी और रेफरल को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Identifies and prioritises issues","description":"Identifies and prioritizes the HCM issues to be discussed in the sector meetings-Identifies and prioritizes the THR issues to be discussed in the sector meetings-Identifies and prioritizes the growth monitoring issues to be discussed in the sector meetings-Identifies and prioritizes referral issues to be discussed in the sector meetings","lang-hi-name":"मुद्दों को पहचानती है और प्राथमिकता देती है","lang-hi-description":"मुद्दों को पहचानती है और प्राथमिकता देती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Conducts periodic surveys and explains issues to supervisors","description":"Conducts periodic survey for HCM beneficiaries-Explains the THR related issues to the Supervisor and Conducts periodic survey for THR beneficiaries-Conducts periodic growth monitoring sessions as per ICDS Calendar (Wajan Diwas etc.)-Explains the referral related issues to the Supervisor","lang-hi-name":"समय - children.name: Sector Meetings
children.description: Documents and discuss HCM, THR, growth monitoring and referral related issues in sector meetings

additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: क्षेत्र की बैठकें
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: क्षेत्र की बैठकें
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Understands THR, HCM, growth monitoring and referral","description":"Is aware of Beneficiaries (3-6 years) in catchment area-Understands THR related issues-Understands growth monitoring related issues (functionality of GMDs, availability and usage of growth monitoring charts, referral of severe undernourished children with complications to the NRC, community-based management of moderate malnourished children and NRC returned children etc.)-Understands referral related issues faced by the beneficiaries (Family and health service related issues)","lang-hi-name":"THR, HCM, वृद्धि निगरानी और रेफरल को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"THR, HCM, वृद्धि निगरानी और रेफरल को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Identifies and prioritises issues","description":"Identifies and prioritizes the HCM issues to be discussed in the sector meetings-Identifies and prioritizes the THR issues to be discussed in the sector meetings-Identifies and prioritizes the growth monitoring issues to be discussed in the sector meetings-Identifies and prioritizes referral issues to be discussed in the sector meetings","lang-hi-name":"मुद्दों को पहचानती है और प्राथमिकता देती है","lang-hi-description":"मुद्दों को पहचानती है और प्राथमिकता देती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Conducts periodic surveys and explains issues to supervisors","description":"Conducts periodic survey for HCM beneficiaries-Explains the THR related issues to the Supervisor and Conducts periodic survey for THR beneficiaries-Conducts periodic growth monitoring sessions as per ICDS Calendar (Wajan Diwas etc.)-Explains the referral related issues to the Supervisor","lang-hi-name":"समय - समय पर सर्वेक्षण करती है और पर्यवेक्षकों को मुद्दों की व्याख्या करती है","lang-hi-description":"समय - समय पर सर्वेक्षण करती है और पर्यवेक्षकों को मुद्दों की व्याख्या करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Documents using trackers/registers","description":"Documents record keeping activity for HCM-Coordinates with the SHG members/Other Stakeholders(NAFED) for THR related data alignment-Timely updates the data fields of Poshan tracker/register (height and weight values, plotting of growth charts, list of underweight, wasted and stunted children etc.)-Rationalizes the feasible solutions for referral issues","lang-hi-name":"ट्रैकर/ रजिस्टर का प्रयोग करते हुए दस्तावेजीकरण करती है","lang-hi-description":"ट्रैकर/ रजिस्टर का प्रयोग करते हुए दस्तावेजीकरण करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Timely updation of data fields","description":"Timely updates the data fields of the Poshan tracker/register (list of 3-6 yr children, procurement of raw materials, number of children present at the AWC and consumed HCM)-Timely updates the data fields of Poshan tracker/register (list of ICDS THR beneficiaries, date and number of beneficiaries whom THR was distributed)-Collates/consolidates appropriate data for the MPR and shares at sector meeting, VHSNC meetings and VHSNDs-Jointly (AWW with the Supervisor) solves the possible referral related issues","lang-hi-name":"डेटा क्षेत्रों का समय पर अद्यतन","lang-hi-description":"डेटा क्षेत्रों का समय पर अद्यतन"}]

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Understands growth monitoring among children and its advantages","description":"Understands Supplementary Nutrition Rules are issued by MWCD in 2017-Understands forms and formats related to MWCD assessment-Understands relevance of growth monitoring among children-Understand how growth measured and how is it useful.-Understands various types of measurements","lang-hi-name":"बच्चों की वृद्धि की निगरानी और इसके लाभ को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"बच्चों की वृद्धि की निगरानी और इसके लाभ को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Plans and schedules growth monitoring","description":"Prepares appropriate and need based carriculum-Determines children who may have special abilities or special needs for which they need additional support-Analyzes the data with assessment tools-Interprets documents, reflect, and record data based on assessment-Practices use of growth monitoring devices (infant weighing scale, Infantometer, adult weighing scale and Stadiometer)-Interprets individuals with normal and abnormal nutritional status","lang-hi-name":"वृद्धि निगरानी की योजना बनाती है और समय-सारणी बनाती है","lang-hi-description":"वृद्धि निगरानी की योजना बनाती है और समय-सारणी बनाती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Organises PTM","description":"Manages PTM for child's learning and development needs-Informs parents on their child's progress-Adapts various available platforms and frequency of growth monitoring eg. additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: वृद्धि मूल्यांकन और निगरानी
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: वृद्धि मूल्यांकन और निगरानी
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Understands growth monitoring among children and its advantages","description":"Understands Supplementary Nutrition Rules are issued by MWCD in 2017-Understands forms and formats related to MWCD assessment-Understands relevance of growth monitoring among children-Understand how growth measured and how is it useful.-Understands various types of measurements","lang-hi-name":"बच्चों की वृद्धि की निगरानी और इसके लाभ को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"बच्चों की वृद्धि की निगरानी और इसके लाभ को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Plans and schedules growth monitoring","description":"Prepares appropriate and need based carriculum-Determines children who may have special abilities or special needs for which they need additional support-Analyzes the data with assessment tools-Interprets documents, reflect, and record data based on assessment-Practices use of growth monitoring devices (infant weighing scale, Infantometer, adult weighing scale and Stadiometer)-Interprets individuals with normal and abnormal nutritional status","lang-hi-name":"वृद्धि निगरानी की योजना बनाती है और समय-सारणी बनाती है","lang-hi-description":"वृद्धि निगरानी की योजना बनाती है और समय-सारणी बनाती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Organises PTM","description":"Manages PTM for child's learning and development needs-Informs parents on their child's progress-Adapts various available platforms and frequency of growth monitoring eg. Infantometer (Machine used for measuring length of small babies), weighing machine, Stadiometer (Machine used for measuring height in children) etc","lang-hi-name":"अभिभावक-शिक्षक बैठक आयोजित करती है","lang-hi-description":"अभिभावक-शिक्षक बैठक आयोजित करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Measures height and weight of children","description":"Measures the height and weight of children with  standard procedures-Measures the length of children with standard procedures-Confirms the length and if there is a difference between the two readings, then measures the child for the third time to confirm the actual length","lang-hi-name":"बच्चों की लंबाई और वजन मापती है","lang-hi-description":"बच्चों की लंबाई और वजन मापती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Counsels ","description":"Leads activities for advocacy, awareness generation and involvement of parents -Clarifies needs to support the child's learning and development at home and in the AWC-Counsels  the parents of the child that their child's height is less for his age (growth is slow)-Counsels the parents to monitor the child's progress monthly-Monitors child in the green zone/normal, then congratulates the parents and asks them to continue feeding the child well and ensures sanitation and hygiene","lang-hi-name":"परामर्श ","lang-hi-description":"परामर्श "}]

diseases, signs, symptoms, treatment care and support-Understands various conditions leading to avoidable blindness and deafness and screening methods-Understands various non Communicable diseases (NCDs), their screening (beneficiaries, methods and frequency) and community based assessment checklist-Understands signs of healthy mouth changes in various age groups, common oral diseases (including Fluorosis), emergency conditions and various side effects of tobaco consuption-Understands various iodine deficinency disorders, importance of cunsumption of iodised salt-Understands importance of mental health, common mental disorders","lang-hi-name":"विभिन्न बीमारियों, उनके लक्षणों और उनकी जटिलताओं के बारे में समझना","lang-hi-description":"विभिन्न बीमारियों, उनके लक्षणों और उनकी various services provided under national mental health program and recording and mentainance of data","lang-hi-name":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग को समझना","lang-hi-description":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग को समझना"},{"level":"3","name":"Conducts contact tracing and screening","description":"Conducts pre and post screening and and follow up counselling and maintain a compilation of records for NACP-Conducts contact tracing and create awareness for RNTCP/NTEP-Administers and monitors second dose onwards to cases refered from PHC/APHC for MDT and record of result in case card for NLEP-Collects blood slides, conducts Rapid Diagnostic Test and replenishes stocks of slides and drugs as per records for vector borne diseases-Screens and refers all suspects of blindness and deafness for appropriate treatment to higher facilities and conduct follow ups-Screens all the beneficiaries and refers the suspects of NCDs and conduct follow ups-Screens suspected cases for various oral diseases and advise primary precutionary interventions-Screens suspected cases for various iodine deficiency disorders-Screens the beneficiaries and refers the suspects of mental disorders to appropriate facilities","lang-hi-name":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग करना","lang-hi-description":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग करना"},{"level":"4","name":"Spreads awareness among coworkers and NACP-Educates community members and monitor entire treatment cycle of patients(DOTS) and record of result in the treatment card-Coordinates with ASHA to suspect cases of leprosy, follow up treatment for completion in time and counsel patients and community members-Administers doses, record results and prevention of breeding places of vectors through IEC and community mobilization-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures and services provided under NPPCD and NPCB&VI. Create awareness for eye donation in comuunity-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures, monitor treatment of patients and keep records on NCD card, prescribed reporting format of NPCDCS, NCD Application etc-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures, cessation of tobaco consumption etc-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures for iodine deficiency disorders-Educates community members and patients over importance of mental health, services provided under NMHP","lang-hi-name":"सहकर्मियों और समुदाय के सदस्यों के बीच जागरूकता फैलाना","lang-hi-description":"सहकर्मियों और समुदाय के सदस्यों के बीच जागरूकता फैलाना"},{"level":"5","name":"Evaluates the condition of the patient","description":"Assists doctors as and when required and provide referrals to clients with HIV/AIDS-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients with leprosy-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients with TB-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients of VBD-Refers to higher facility in case of any complication in patients post rehabilitation treatment for blindness and deafness-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients of NCD-Provides pre-referal management, refer to higher facility in case of any complications/emergency for iron deficieny disorders -Provide pre-referal management, refer to higher facility in case of any complications/emergency for patients with oral hygiene issues-Follows up with mental disorder patients under rehabilitation treatment and referal if required","lang-hi-name":"रोगी की स्थिति का मूल्यांकन करना","lang-hi-description":"रोगी की स्थिति का मूल्यांकन करना"}]

133.name: Usage of any application on mobile device
133.description: Is able to use a mobile phone and/or a tablet to log in to digital application using login ID and password or OTP

additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: मोबाइल डिवाइस के अप्लीकेशन का प्रयोग करना
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: लॉगिन आईडी एवं पासवर्ड या ओटीपी का प्रयोग करते हुए डिजिटल अप्लीकेशन में लॉग इन करने के लिए मोबाइल फोन और/ या टैबलेट का इस्तेमाल करने में सक्षम होना
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Switches on mobile device and connects to internet","description":"Utilises the power on/off, lock/unlock feature on mobile phone and tablet- Understands how to connect to internet through mobile data/wifi","lang-hi-name":"मोबाइल डिवाइस को स्विच ऑन करना और इंटरनेट चालू करना","lang-hi-description":"मोबाइल डिवाइस को स्विच ऑन करना और इंटरनेट चालू करना"},{"level":"2","name":"Navigates on the device and finds the correct mobile applications","description":"Navigates the various mobile applications in the device to identify the relevant mobile applications from the logo/name","lang-hi-name":"डिवाइस को चलाना और सही मोबाइल अप्लीकेशन को ढूंढ़ना","lang-hi-description":"डिवाइस को चलाना और सही मोबाइल अप्लीकेशन को ढूंढ़ना"},{"level":"3","name":"Installs, uninstalls or updates the mobile application","description":"Finds the correct version of the health applications in play store- Install/Uninstalls and/or updates the mobile application","lang-hi-name":"मोबाइल अप्लीकेशन को इंस्टाल, अनइंस्टाल या अपडेट करना","lang-hi-description":"मोबाइल अप्लीकेशन को इंस्टाल, अनइंस्टाल या अपडेट करना"},{"level":"4","name":"Creates user name, login and logout","description":"Creates a user name if required- Logs into the mobile applications through login ID and password and/or OTP as required and logs out","lang-hi-name":"यूजर नेम बनाना, लॉगिन और लॉगआउट करना","lang-hi-description":"यूजर नेम बनाना, लॉगिन और लॉगआउट करना"},{"level":"5","name":"Checks and updates version and/or language of mobile application","description":"Checks and compares the version of the mobile application downloaded with what is available in the play store- Changes the language of the mobile application from English to Hindi as per convenience","lang-hi-name":"मोबाइल अप्लीकेशन के वर्जन और/ या लांग्वेज को चेक करना और उसे अपडेट करना","lang-hi-description":"मोबाइल अप्लीकेशन के वर्जन और/ या लांग्वेज को चेक करना और उसे अपडेट करना"}]

130.name: Date entry into mobile health applications

additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: नियमों को समझना और हेल्थ अप्लीकेशंस में आरएमएनसीएच, वीबीडी, महत्वपूर्ण आंकड़ों और मृत्यु, लैब टेस्टिंग और स्टॉक डेटा को दर्ज करना
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Understands indicators in the application","description":"Understands the indicators in the following modules - ANC, ID, pregnancy outcome, newborn, PNC, FP, Immunization and childhood diseases-Understands the indicators in the VBD module-Understands the indicators in the vital statistics and death reporting module-Understands the indicators in the lab testing and stock data reporting module","lang-hi-name":"अप्लीकेशन में सूचकों को समझना","lang-hi-description":"अप्लीकेशन में सूचकों को समझना"},{"level":"2","name":"Classifies and enters data in online mode","description":"Classifies the values falling beyond the Min-Max values for each indicator - Interprets the pop-ups when invalid data is entered ","lang-hi-name":"ऑनलाइन मोड में डेटा का वर्गीकरण करना और दर्ज करना","lang-hi-description":"ऑनलाइन मोड में डेटा का वर्गीकरण करना और दर्ज करना"},{"level":"3","name":"Reviews data","description":"Reviews the health data to be input into the mobile application for outliers- Amends the data for entry as required after due verification to decrease outliers","lang-hi-name":"डेटा की समीक्षा करना","lang-hi-description":"डेटा की समीक्षा करना"},{"level":"4","name":"Enters data and corrects data if required in offline mode","description":"Fills the data in offline mode when internet is not available- Retreives the offline data-Corrects if required and sync data when internet is available","lang-hi-name":"डेटा को दर्ज करना और आवश्यकता पड़ने पर ऑफलाइन मोड में डेटा को सही करना","lang-hi-description":"डेटा को दर्ज करना और आवश्यकता पड़ने पर ऑफलाइन मोड में डेटा को सही करना"},{"level":"5","name":"Accesses the reports","description":"Accesses the reports Downloads relevant reports available to the user-Interprets the reports","lang-hi-name":"रिपोर्ट का मूल्यांकन करना","lang-hi-description":"रिपोर्ट का मूल्यांकन करना"}]

(NCDs), their screening (beneficiaries, methods and frequency) and community based assessment checklist-Understands signs of healthy mouth changes in various age groups, common oral diseases counselling-Understands contact tracing, directly Observed Treatment (Dots) and follow up counselling for NTEP/RNTCP-Understands suspect cases and Multi Drug Therapy (MDT) and follow up counseling for leprosy-Understands collection of blood slides , Rapid Diagnostic Test and follow up counseling for vector borne diseases-Understands preventive measures, various services provided under NPPCD and NPCB&VI and possible complications post rehabilitation treatment-Understands treatment of various NCDs, their complications, follow up counselling and NCD Card-Understands signs and symptoms of various oral diseases, pre referal treatment and preventive measures-Understands screening of various iodine deficiency disorders, preventive measures and testing of salt for iodine level-Understands various services provided under national mental health program and recording and mentainance of data","lang-hi-name":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग को समझना","lang-hi-description":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग को समझना"},{"level":"3","name":"Conducts contact tracing and screening","description":"Conducts pre and post screening and and follow up counselling and maintain a compilation of records for NACP-Conducts contact tracing and create awareness for RNTCP/NTEP-Administers and monitors second dose onwards to cases refered from PHC/APHC for MDT and record of result in case card for NLEP-Collects blood slides, conducts Rapid Diagnostic Test and replenishes stocks of slides and drugs as per records for vector borne diseases-Screens and refers all suspects of blindness and deafness for appropriate treatment to higher facilities and conduct follow ups-Screens all the beneficiaries and refers the suspects of NCDs and conduct follow ups-Screens suspected cases for various oral diseases and advise primary precutionary interventions-Screens suspected cases for various iodine deficiency disorders-Screens the beneficiaries and refers the suspects of mental disorders to appropriate facilities","lang-hi-name":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग करना","lang-hi-description":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग करना"},{"level":"4","name":"Spreads awareness among coworkers and community members","description":"Educates coworkers and community members and support programs (eg ICTCs/ART Centers/ PPTCT Centers/ STI Clinics etc) and provide drugs as recommended by doctors for NACP-Educates community members and monitor entire treatment cycle of patients(DOTS) and record of result in the treatment card-Coordinates with ASHA to suspect cases of leprosy, follow up treatment for completion in time and counsel patients and community members-Administers doses, record results and prevention of breeding places of vectors through IEC and community mobilization-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures and services provided under NPPCD and NPCB&VI. Create awareness for eye donation in comuunity-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures, monitor treatment of patients and keep records on NCD card, prescribed reporting format of NPCDCS, NCD Application etc-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures, cessation of tobaco consumption etc-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures for iodine deficiency disorders-Educates community members and patients over importance of mental health, services provided under NMHP","lang-hi-name":"सहकर्मियों और समुदाय के सदस्यों के बीच जागरूकता फैलाना","lang-hi-description":"सहकर्मियों और समुदाय के सदस्यों के बीच जागरूकता फैलाना"},{"level":"5","name":"Evaluates the condition of the patient","description":"Assists doctors as and when required and provide referrals to clients with HIV/AIDS-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients with leprosy-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients with TB-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients of VBD-Refers to higher facility in case of any complication in patients post rehabilitation treatment for blindness and deafness-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients of NCD-Provides pre-referal management, refer to higher facility in case of any complications/emergency for iron deficieny disorders -Provide pre-referal management, refer to higher facility in case of any complications/emergency for patients with oral hygiene issues-Follows up with mental disorder patients under rehabilitation treatment and referal if required","lang-hi-name":"रोगी की स्थिति का मूल्यांकन करना","lang-hi-description":"रोगी की स्थिति का मूल्यांकन करना"}]

of records for NACP-Conducts contact tracing and create awareness for RNTCP/NTEP-Administers and monitors second dose onwards to cases refered from PHC/APHC for MDT and record of result in case card for NLEP-Collects blood slides, conducts Rapid Diagnostic Test and replenishes stocks of slides and drugs as per records for vector borne diseases-Screens and refers all suspects of blindness and deafness for appropriate treatment to higher facilities and conduct follow ups-Screens all the beneficiaries and refers the suspects of NCDs and conduct follow ups-Screens suspected cases for various oral diseases and advise primary precutionary interventions-Screens suspected cases for various iodine deficiency disorders-Screens the beneficiaries and refers the suspects of mental disorders to appropriate facilities","lang-hi-name":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग करना","lang-hi-description":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग करना"},{"level":"4","name":"Spreads awareness among coworkers and community members","description":"Educates coworkers and community members and support programs (eg ICTCs/ART Centers/ PPTCT Centers/ STI Clinics etc) and provide drugs as recommended by doctors for NACP-Educates community members and monitor entire treatment cycle of patients(DOTS) and record of result in the treatment card-Coordinates with ASHA to suspect cases of leprosy, follow up treatment for completion in time and counsel patients and community members-Administers doses, record results and prevention of breeding places of vectors through IEC and community mobilization-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures and services provided under NPPCD and NPCB&VI. Create awareness for eye donation in comuunity-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures, monitor treatment of patients and keep records on NCD card, prescribed reporting format of NPCDCS, NCD Application etc-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures, cessation of tobaco consumption etc-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures for iodine deficiency disorders-Educates community members and patients over importance of mental health, services provided under NMHP","lang-hi-name":"सहकर्मियों और समुदाय के सदस्यों के बीच जागरूकता फैलाना","lang-hi-description":"सहकर्मियों और समुदाय के सदस्यों के बीच जागरूकता फैलाना"},{"level":"5","name":"Evaluates the condition of the patient","description":"Assists doctors as and when required and provide referrals to clients with HIV/AIDS-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients with leprosy-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients with TB-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients of VBD-Refers to higher facility in case of any complication in patients post rehabilitation treatment for blindness and deafness-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients of NCD-Provides pre-referal management, refer to higher facility in case of any complications/emergency for iron deficieny disorders -Provide pre-referal management, refer to higher facility in case of any complications/emergency for patients with oral hygiene issues-Follows up with mental disorder patients under rehabilitation treatment and referal if required","lang-hi-name":"रोगी की स्थिति का मूल्यांकन करना","lang-hi-description":"रोगी की स्थिति का मूल्यांकन करना"}]

additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: स्क्रीनिंग आयोजित करना और विभिन्न स्वास्थ्य कार्यक्रमों के बारे में जागरूकता पैदा करना
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Understands various diseases, their symptoms and their complications","description":"Understands HIV/AIDS transmission, treatment care and support-Understands tuberculosis, how it spreads, its symptoms and Sputum test-Understands leprosy, its side effects, complications, regularity of treatment etc.-Understands vector borne diseases, signs, symptoms, treatment care and support-Understands various conditions leading to avoidable blindness and deafness and screening methods-Understands various non Communicable diseases (NCDs), their screening (beneficiaries, methods and frequency) and community based assessment checklist-Understands signs of healthy mouth changes in various age groups, common oral diseases (including Fluorosis), emergency conditions and various side effects of tobaco consuption-Understands various iodine deficinency disorders, importance of cunsumption of iodised salt-Understands importance of mental health, common mental disorders","lang-hi-name":"विभिन्न बीमारियों, उनके लक्षणों और उनकी जटिलताओं के बारे में समझना","lang-hi-description":"विभिन्न बीमारियों, उनके लक्षणों और उनकी जटिलताओं के बारे में समझना"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands contact tracing and screening","description":"Understands pre and post screening test(i.e. Rapid Test) and follow up counselling-Understands contact tracing, directly Observed Treatment (Dots) and follow up counselling for NTEP/RNTCP-Understands suspect cases and Multi Drug Therapy (MDT) and follow up counseling for leprosy-Understands collection of blood slides , Rapid Diagnostic Test and follow up counseling for vector borne diseases-Understands preventive measures, various services provided under NPPCD and NPCB&VI and possible complications post rehabilitation treatment-Understands treatment of various NCDs, their complications, follow up counselling and NCD Card-Understands signs and symptoms of various oral diseases, pre referal treatment and preventive measures-Understands screening of various iodine deficiency disorders, preventive measures and testing of salt for iodine level-Understands various services provided under national mental health program and recording and mentainance of data","lang-hi-name":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग को समझना","lang-hi-description":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग को समझना"},{"level":"3","name":"Conducts contact tracing and screening","description":"Conducts pre and post screening and and follow up counselling and maintain a compilation of records for NACP-Conducts contact tracing and create awareness for RNTCP/NTEP-Administers and monitors second dose onwards to cases refered from PHC/APHC for MDT and record of result in case card for NLEP-Collects blood slides, conducts Rapid Diagnostic Test and replenishes stocks of slides and drugs as per records for vector borne diseases-Screens and refers all suspects of blindness and deafness for appropriate treatment to higher facilities and conduct follow ups-Screens all the beneficiaries and refers the suspects of NCDs and conduct follow ups-Screens suspected cases for various oral diseases and advise primary precutionary interventions-Screens suspected cases for various iodine deficiency disorders-Screens the beneficiaries and refers the suspects of mental disorders to appropriate facilities","lang-hi-name":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग करना","lang-hi-description":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग करना"},{"level":"4","name":"Spreads awareness among coworkers and community members","description":"Educates coworkers and community members and support programs (eg ICTCs/ART Centers/ PPTCT Centers/ STI Clinics etc) and provide drugs as recommended by doctors for NACP-Educates community members and monitor entire treatment cycle of patients(DOTS) and record of result in the treatment card-Coordinates with ASHA to suspect cases of leprosy, follow up treatment for completion in time and counsel patients and community members-Administers doses, record results and prevention of breeding places of vectors through IEC and community mobilization-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures and services provided under NPPCD and NPCB&VI. Create awareness for eye donation in comuunity-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures, monitor treatment of patients and keep records on NCD card, prescribed reporting format of NPCDCS, NCD Application etc-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures, cessation of tobaco consumption etc-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures for iodine deficiency disorders-Educates community members and patients over importance of mental health, services provided under NMHP","lang-hi-name":"सहकर्मियों और समुदाय के सदस्यों के बीच जागरूकता फैलाना","lang-hi-description":"सहकर्मियों और समुदाय के सदस्यों के बीच जागरूकता फैलाना"},{"level":"5","name":"Evaluates the condition of the patient","description":"Assists doctors as and when required and provide referrals to clients with HIV/AIDS-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients with leprosy-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients with TB-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients of VBD-Refers to higher facility in case of any complication in patients post rehabilitation treatment for blindness and deafness-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients of NCD-Provides pre-referal management, refer to higher facility in case of any complications/emergency for iron deficieny disorders -Provide pre-referal management, refer to higher facility in case of any complications/emergency for patients with oral hygiene issues-Follows up with mental disorder patients under rehabilitation treatment and referal if required","lang-hi-name":"रोगी की स्थिति का मूल्यांकन करना","lang-hi-description":"रोगी की स्थिति का मूल्यांकन करना"}]

rights, care and support for PWDs-Understands various government schemes and opportunities for PWDs","lang-hi-name":"बुजुर्गों की बीमारियों और विभिन्न विकलांगता तथा सरकारी योजनाओं को समझना","lang-hi-description":"बुजुर्गों की बीमारियों और विभिन्न विकलांगता तथा सरकारी योजनाओं को समझना"},{"level":"2","name":"Provides health education and creates awareness","description":"Provides Provides information on various government schemes and opportunities available for PWDs","lang-hi-name":"स्वास्थ्य शिक्षा प्रदान करना और जागरूकता पैदा करना","lang-hi-description":"स्वास्थ्य शिक्षा प्रदान करना और जागरूकता पैदा करना"},{"level":"3","name":"Provides care and support","description":"Arranges suitable callipers and supportive devices for elderly-Identifies PWDs-Provides care and in looking after PWDs-Creates linkages with support groups -Ensures various benefits and concessions are provided to PWDs","lang-hi-name":"जुड़ाव और सामुदायिक संलग्नता उत्पन्न additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: वीएचएनडी और राष्ट्रीय किशोर-किशोरी स्वास्थ्य कार्यक्रमों को आयोजित करना

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Understands guidelines for conducting VHNDs and NAHP","description":"Identifies different villages and hamlets-Understands types of target groups and services provided in National Adolescent Health Programs","lang-hi-name":"वीएचएनडी और एनएएचपी आयोजित करने के दिशानिर्देशों को समझना","lang-hi-description":"वीएचएनडी और एनएएचपी आयोजित करने के दिशानिर्देशों को समझना"},{"level":"2","name":"Estimates beneficiaries and commodities required ","description":"Estimates the no. of beneficiaries-Estimates the number of Adolescent Health Programs","lang-hi-name":"वीएचएनडी और एनएएचपी अभियानों का आयोजन करना","lang-hi-description":"वीएचएनडी और एनएएचपी अभियानों का आयोजन करना"},{"level":"4","name":"Plans and organises 100.name: Pregnancy Identification
100.description: Conducts initial assessment to identify pregnancy, High risk pregnancy and estimate gestational age

additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: गर्भावस्था की पहचान
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: गर्भावस्था, उच्च जोखिम गर्भावस्था की पहचान करने और गर्भकालीन उम्र का अनुमान लगाने के लिए प्रारंभिक मूल्यांकन करना
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Understands health of males and females and initial assessment protocols ","description":"Understands the anatomy/physiology of male reproductive, sexual health -Understands the female reproductive, sexual, menstrual and ovulatory health-Understands initial assessment protocols for PW during ANC-Understands HRP identification and protocol for tracking","lang-hi-name":"पुरुषों और महिलाओं के स्वास्थ्य और प्रारंभिक मूल्यांकन प्रोटोकॉल को समझना","lang-hi-description":"पुरुषों और महिलाओं के स्वास्थ्य और प्रारंभिक मूल्यांकन प्रोटोकॉल को समझना"},{"level":"2","name":"Identifies pregnancy using Nischaya Kit","description":"Conducts pregnancy test using Nischay kit-Interprets results accurately","lang-hi-name":"निशाया किट का उपयोग करके गर्भावस्था की पहचान करना","lang-hi-description":"निशाया किट का उपयोग करके गर्भावस्था की पहचान करना"},{"level":"3","name":"Conducts initial assessment  ","description":"Conducts obstetric investigation of the woman as per protocol-Conducts menstrual history investigation of the woman as per protocol   -Understands TD/booster doses ","lang-hi-name":"प्रारंभिक मूल्यांकन करना","lang-hi-description":"प्रारंभिक मूल्यांकन करना"},{"level":"4","name":"Identifies HRP and Estimates gestational age ","description":"Identifies HRP based on initial assessments-Applies the principles to estimate EDD through LMP -Estimates EDD through initial assessment  -Estimates gestational age","lang-hi-name":"एचआरपी की पहचान करना और गर्भकालीन उम्र का अनुमान लगाना","lang-hi-description":"एचआरपी की पहचान करना और गर्भकालीन उम्र का अनुमान लगाना"},{"level":"5","name":"Administers TD/booster as per protocol -Maintains a line-list of HRP cases","description":"Administers TD/Booster dose as per regime -Assesses the level of risk of pregnancy based on initial assessment-Maintains a line list of HRP cases for follow-up care","lang-hi-name":"प्रोटोकॉल के अनुसार टीडी/ बूस्टर का प्रबंधन करना  - एचआरपी केसों की एक लाइन - सूची बनाना","lang-hi-description":"प्रोटोकॉल के अनुसार टीडी/ बूस्टर का प्रबंधन करना  - एचआरपी केसों की एक लाइन - सूची बनाना"}]

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Understands all services provided by different FLWs","description":"Understands key components of services provided by different FLWs-Understands establishing linkages to improve service delivery","lang-hi-name":"विभिन्न फ्रंटलाइन कार्यकर्ताओं द्वारा प्रदान की जाने वाली सभी सेवाओं को समझना","lang-hi-description":"विभिन्न फ्रंटलाइन कार्यकर्ताओं द्वारा प्रदान की जाने वाली सभी सेवाओं को समझना"},{"level":"2","name":"Coordinates with FLWs for service delivery","description":"Maps services provided by FLWs -Coordinates with FLWs -Allocates services to FLWs to provide services to beneficiaries in a timely and effective manner","lang-hi-name":"सेवा प्रदान करने के लिए फ्रंटलाइन कार्यकर्ताओं के साथ समन्वय करना","lang-hi-description":"सेवा प्रदान करने के लिए फ्रंटलाइन कार्यकर्ताओं के साथ समन्वय करना"},{"level":"3","name":"Monitors performance of FLWs","description":"Monitors performance of FLWs-Takes steps to ensure performance matches standards-Assesses any performance gaps in FLWs ","lang-hi-name":"फ्रंटलाइन कार्यकर्ताओं के प्रदर्शन की निगरानी करना","lang-hi-description":"फ्रंटलाइन कार्यकर्ताओं के प्रदर्शन की निगरानी करना"},{"level":"4","name":"Ensures services are managed ","description":"Provides collaborative follow-up with beneficiaries and health facilities-Ensures key indicators are managed appropriately","lang-hi-name":"सेवाओं के प्रबंधन को सुनिश्चित करना","lang-hi-description":"सेवाओं के प्रबंधन को सुनिश्चित करना"},{"level":"5","name":"Suggests performance improvement plans","description":"Provides critical and constructive feedback to improve performance of FLWs-Suggests trainings to FLWs for improvement in performance","lang-hi-name":"प्रदर्शन सुधार योजनाओं का सुझाव देना","lang-hi-description":"प्रदर्शन सुधार योजनाओं का सुझाव देना"}]

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Understands indicators in the application","description":"Understands the indicators in the following modules - ANC, ID, pregnancy outcome, newborn, PNC, FP, Immunization and childhood diseases-Understands the indicators in the VBD module-Understands the indicators in the vital statistics and death reporting module-Understands the indicators in the lab testing and stock data reporting module","lang-hi-name":"अप्लीकेशन में सूचकों को समझना","lang-hi-description":"अप्लीकेशन में सूचकों को समझना"},{"level":"2","name":"Classifies and enters data in online mode","description":"Classifies the values falling beyond the Min-Max values for each indicator - Interprets the pop-ups when invalid data is entered ","lang-hi-name":"ऑनलाइन मोड में डेटा का वर्गीकरण करना और दर्ज करना","lang-hi-description":"ऑनलाइन मोड में डेटा का वर्गीकरण करना और दर्ज करना"},{"level":"3","name":"Reviews data","description":"Reviews the health data to be input into the mobile application for outliers- Amends the data for entry as required after due verification to decrease outliers","lang-hi-name":"डेटा की समीक्षा करना","lang-hi-description":"डेटा की समीक्षा करना"},{"level":"4","name":"Enters data and corrects data if required in offline mode","description":"Fills the data in offline mode when internet is not available- Retreives the offline data-Corrects if required and sync data when internet is available","lang-hi-name":"डेटा को दर्ज करना और आवश्यकता पड़ने पर ऑफलाइन मोड में डेटा को सही करना","lang-hi-description":"डेटा को दर्ज करना और आवश्यकता पड़ने पर ऑफलाइन मोड में डेटा को सही करना"},{"level":"5","name":"Accesses the reports","description":"Accesses the reports Downloads relevant reports available to the user-Interprets the reports","lang-hi-name":"रिपोर्ट का मूल्यांकन करना","lang-hi-description":"रिपोर्ट का मूल्यांकन करना"}]

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Understands MCDR protocols","description":"Comprehends existing protocols and processes for Maternal Death Review set by the State- Comprehends existing protocols and processes for Child Death Review set by the State","lang-hi-name":"एमसीडीआर प्रोटोकॉल को समझना","lang-hi-description":"एमसीडीआर प्रोटोकॉल को समझना"},{"level":"2","name":"Notifies identified Maternal/Child death","description":"Identifies Maternal or Child Death in the community- Notifies the death to the point person at PHC/CHC in prescribed format within 24 hours","lang-hi-name":"पहचान की गई मातृ/ बाल मृत्यु की सूचना देना","lang-hi-description":"पहचान की गई मातृ/ बाल मृत्यु की सूचना देना"},{"level":"3","name":"Support in MCDR community investigation","description":"Coordinates community interaction for MCDR investigations- Participates in collecting information from community related to MCDR investigation","lang-hi-name":"एमसीडीआर सामुदायिक जांच में सहयोग करना","lang-hi-description":"एमसीडीआर सामुदायिक जांच में सहयोग करना"},{"level":"4","name":"Compile and present information related to MCDR","description":"Compile records and reports related to MCDR process- Present findings from community related to MCDR process","lang-hi-name":"एमसीडीआर से संबंधित जानकारी को संकलित करना और प्रस्तुत करना","lang-hi-description":"एमसीडीआर से संबंधित जानकारी को संकलित करना और प्रस्तुत करना"},{"level":"5","name":"Implement suggestions by MCDR committee","description":"Implement suggestions given by MCDR committee based on their review","lang-hi-name":"एमसीडीआर समिति द्वारा दिए गए सुझावों को कार्यान्वित करना","lang-hi-description":"एमसीडीआर समिति द्वारा दिए गए सुझावों को कार्यान्वित करना"}]

220.name: Pregnancy Identification
220.description: Conducts initial assessment to identify pregnancy, High risk pregnancy and estimate gestational age

additionalProperties.subject: Midwifery & Gynecological Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: गर्भावस्था की पहचान
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: गर्भावस्था की पहचान
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands health of males and females and initial assessment protocols","description":"Understands  the  anatomy/physiology  of  male reproductive, sexual health
-Understands the female reproductive, sexual, menstrual and ovulatory health
-Understands  initial  assessment  protocols  for PW during ANC
-Understands  HRP  identification  and  protocol for tracking","lang-hi-name":"पुरुषों और महिलाओं के स्वास्थ्य और प्रारंभिक जांच प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"पुरुषों और महिलाओं के स्वास्थ्य और प्रारंभिक जांच प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Identifies pregnancy","description":"Knows when to conduct pregnancy test and Interprets the result of pregnancy test from the Nischay Kit","lang-hi-name":"गर्भावस्था की पहचान करती है","lang-hi-description":"गर्भावस्था की पहचान करती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Knows ANC assessment ","description":"Knows obstetric checkup of the woman as per protocol
-Knows LMP, GPLA, medical, surgical and family history 
-Knows the physical examination to be done during ANC like BP,temperature, pallor, edema and per abdomen  
 -knows the tests to be done during pregnancy
-knows the interventions during pregnancy
-Knows calculation of EDD
-Knows obstetrical grips
-Understands Danger signs
-Knows about the Dietary Advice that should be provided to PW
-Knows about the Medication Advice that should be provided to PW","lang-hi-name":"एएनसी की जांच जानती है ","lang-hi-description":"एएनसी की जांच जानती है "},{"level":"4","name":"Conducts ANC assessment and provides ANC interventions","description":"Conducts obstetric checkup of the woman as per protocol
-Asks for LMP, GPLA, medical, surgical and family history 
-Perform the physical examination to be done during ANC like BP,temperature, pallor, edema and per abdomen  
 -performs the tests to be done during pregnancy like Hb, urine , blood group, HIVetc
-Administers inj Td , IFA, calcium, albendazole during pregnancy
-Calculates EDD
-Assesses danger signs 
-Provides Dietry Advice to PW
-Provides Medication Advice to PW","lang-hi-name":"एएनसी की जांच करती है और एएनसी हस्तक्षेप प्रदान करती है","lang-hi-description":"एएनसी की जांच करती है और एएनसी हस्तक्षेप प्रदान करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Identifies HRP based on assessment and refers them","description":"Identifies ANC which qualify as HRP based on history, examination, investigations and refers them to higher centre","lang-hi-name":"जांच के आधार पर HRP की पहचान करती है और उन्हें रेफर करती है","lang-hi-description":"जांच के आधार पर HRP की पहचान करती है और उन्हें रेफर करती है"}]

221.name: Birth Planning and Preparedness for PW and HRP

additionalProperties.subject: Midwifery & Gynecological Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: गर्भवती महिला और HRP के लिए जन्म योजना और तैयारी
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: गर्भवती महिला और HRP के लिए जन्म योजना और तैयारी
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands components of registration for PW","description":"Understands   components   of   registration   for pregnant women
-Understands  components  of  registration  for HRP
-Understands the components of maternal and child protection card and JSY card
-Recognises the birth preparedness checklist for PW","lang-hi-name":"गर्भवती महिला के पंजीकरण के घटकों को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"गर्भवती महिला के पंजीकरण के घटकों को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Prepare schedule for PW/HRP","description":"Prepares schedule for TT injection
-Prepares schedules for antenatal visits
-Prepares schedules for institutional delivery
-Fills the birth preparedness checklist for PW","lang-hi-name":"गर्भवती महिला/ उच्च जोखिम गर्भावस्था की समय सारणी बनाती है","lang-hi-description":"गर्भवती महिला/ उच्च जोखिम गर्भावस्था की समय सारणी बनाती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Provides referral support and prepares emergency birth plans","description":"Identifies  referral  facilities  and  transport  for beneficiary including HRP
-Identifies people for support
- Establishes linkages with appropriate facilities for referral
-Prepares  an  emergency  birth  plan  for  any complications","lang-hi-name":"रेफरल मदद प्रदान करती है और आपातकालीन जन्म योजना तैयार करती है","lang-hi-description":"रेफरल मदद प्रदान करती है और आपातकालीन जन्म योजना तैयार करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Manages patient issues and evaluates strategies to mitigate","description":"Identifies patient issues
-Proposes mitigation strategies based on patient needs
-Applies mitigation strategies","lang-hi-name":"रोगी की समस्याओं का प्रबंधन करती है और इससे निपटने की रणनीतियों का मूल्यांकन करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगी की समस्याओं का प्रबंधन करती है और इससे निपटने की रणनीतियों का मूल्यांकन करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Conducts visits to counsel PW and promotes institutional delivery","description":"Conduct   home   visits   to   counsel   pregnant woman on birth planning
-Conduct  home  visits  to  counsel  household members on birth planning
-Promotes institutional delivery 
-Explains to PW and family members about the importance of institutional delivery","lang-hi-name":"गर्भवती महिला को सलाह देने के लिए विजिट आयोजित करती है और संस्थागत प्रसव को बढ़ावा देती है","lang-hi-description":"गर्भवती महिला को सलाह देने के लिए विजिट आयोजित करती है और संस्थागत प्रसव को बढ़ावा देती है"}]

222.name: Vaginal examination and plotting on partograph
222.description: Conducts vaginal examination, monitors progress of labour and prepares and interprets partograph

additionalProperties.subject: Midwifery & Gynecological Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: योनि की जांच और पार्टोग्राफ पर चित्रण करना
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: योनि की जांच और पार्टोग्राफ पर चित्रण करना
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands vaginal examination, danger signs and partographs","description":"Understands process of vaginal examination
-Understands danger signs
-Understands the use of partograph
-Understands the components of a partograph
-Understands first stage of labor
-Understands active phase of labour
-Understands importance of Partograph Plotting
-Understands Bishop Scoring method
-Understands Uterine Contraction Assessment duration frequency and intentsity","lang-hi-name":"योनि की जांच, खतरे के संकेत और पार्टोग्राफ को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"योनि की जांच, खतरे के संकेत और पार्टोग्राफ को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Performs vaginal examination","description":"Distinguishes  between  latent  stage  and  active stage of pregnancy
-Examines PW every half hour and 4 hours
-Performs  vaginal  examination  to  assess  the condition of the PW and the baby
-Examines Pw for B.P Pulse/temp, etc
-Conducts uterine contraction assessment","lang-hi-name":"योनि की जांच करती है","lang-hi-description":"योनि की जांच करती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Plots partograph","description":"Prepares partograph and plots in realtime
-Conducts appropriate examinations for plotting FHR related components
-Plots progress of labour on the partograph
-Plots maternal condition on the partograph","lang-hi-name":"पार्टोग्राफ पर चित्रण करती है","lang-hi-description":"पार्टोग्राफ पर चित्रण करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Interprets partograph for danger signs","description":"Interprets partograph to recognise complications
-Identifies danger signs based on the alert line
-Identifies if labour is obstructed or prolonged
-Interprets partograph to recognise complications based on FHS and colour of liqor
","lang-hi-name":"खतरे के लक्षणों के लिए पार्टोग्राफ की व्याख्या करती है","lang-hi-description":"खतरे के लक्षणों के लिए पार्टोग्राफ की व्याख्या करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Assesses if referral is required","description":"Assesses if referral to higher facility is required 
-Identifies when mother needs to be referred to FRU for treatment
-Conducts pre-referral management and documents on the referral sheet
","lang-hi-name":"रेफरल की जरूरत पड़ने पर जांच करती है","lang-hi-description":"रेफरल की जरूरत पड़ने पर जांच करती है"}]

","lang-hi-name":"सामान्य प्रसव की व्यवस्था करती है","lang-hi-description":"सामान्य प्रसव की व्यवस्था करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Identifies complications and manages accordingly","description":"Identifies complications related to mother in second stage of labour

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:

-Understands     protocol     of     vitamin     K1 administration
-Understands how to maintain warm chain","lang-hi-name":"संक्रमण की रोकथाम, विटामिन के का इंजेक्शन देने और गर्म माहौल बनाए रखने के प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"संक्रमण की रोकथाम, विटामिन के का इंजेक्शन देने और गर्म माहौल बनाए रखने के प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Performs essential new- born care as per protocol","description":"Performs essential newborn care
