additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: रेफरल से पहले प्रबंधन और परिवहन (नवजात शिशु सहित)
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands referral identification and management","description":"Understands referral identification
-Understands the needs of referral
-Understands referral management
-Understands   stablisation   methods   prior   to transport of neonates
-Understands the importance of stabilisation methods before transportation of patients including neonates","lang-hi-name":"रेफरल की पहचान और प्रबंधन को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"रेफरल की पहचान और प्रबंधन को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands referral counselling and support","description":"Understands referral counselling
-Comprehends referral support
-Understands pre-referral protocols
-Understands prevention protocols for hypothermia, hypoglycaemia and hypoxia in neonates
-Understands the pre-requisites of a referral
-Understands the role of nurses in making referrals","lang-hi-name":"रेफरल परामर्श और सहयोग को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"रेफरल परामर्श और सहयोग को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Identifies need for referral","description":"Identifies indications for referral
-Identifies   different   pre-referral   management techniques
-Provides pre referral management as per protocols","lang-hi-name":"रेफरल की आवश्यकता की पहचान करती है","lang-hi-description":"रेफरल की आवश्यकता की पहचान करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Councels the patient, the attendants (family members) and stablises the patient","description":"Providing the counselling to the client and family members for the need and importance of referral.
- Commencing the referral process.
- Maintains the warm chain for neonates.
- Stabilises the patient prior to transportaion (including neonates)","lang-hi-name":"रोगी, परिचारकों (परिवार के सदस्यों) को सलाह देती है और रोगी को स्थिर करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगी, परिचारकों (परिवार के सदस्यों) को सलाह देती है और रोगी को स्थिर करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Refers patients to higher facility","description":"Refers the patient to appropriate facility by using the free of cost referral transportation provided by the Government.
-Communicates to the client and family members about neonate transportation
- Providing proper documentation and reports as pre-referral management procedure.
- Ensure the medical support including the life support equipments and essential drugs during the transportation with proper and appropriate instructions to the family members and EMT’s
-Organises referral of the client to the appropriate facility
-Manages back referrals                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             ","lang-hi-name":"रोगियों को उच्च स्वास्थ्य केंद्र रेफर करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगियों को उच्च स्वास्थ्य केंद्र रेफर करती है"}]

246.name: Maternal and Child Death Review support
246.description: Is aware of MCDR protocols, notifies any deaths to the point person, supports in the review process and implements feedback from the review process if necessary

additionalProperties.subject: Midwifery & Gynecological Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: मातृ एवं बाल मृत्यु समीक्षा सहयोग
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: मातृ एवं बाल मृत्यु समीक्षा सहयोग
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands MCDR protocols","description":"Comprehends existing protocols and processes for Maternal Death Review set by the State
- Comprehends existing protocols and processes for Child Death Review set by the State","lang-hi-name":"MCDR प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"MCDR प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Notifies identified Maternal/Child death","description":"Identifies   Maternal   or   Child   Death   in   the community
-  Notifies  the  death  to  the  point  person  at PHC/CHC in prescribed format within 24 hours","lang-hi-name":"पहचान की गई मातृ/ बाल मृत्यु की सूचना देती है","lang-hi-description":"पहचान की गई मातृ/ बाल मृत्यु की सूचना देती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Support in MCDR community investigation","description":"Coordinates community interaction for MCDR investigations
-  Participates  in  collecting  information  from community related to MCDR investigation","lang-hi-name":"MCDR सामुदायिक जांच में मदद करती है","lang-hi-description":"MCDR सामुदायिक जांच में मदद करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Compile and present information related to MCDR","description":"Compile records and reports related to MCDR process
- Present findings from community related to MCDR process","lang-hi-name":"MCDR संबंधी जानकारी को संकलित और प्रस्तुत करती है","lang-hi-description":"MCDR संबंधी जानकारी को संकलित और प्रस्तुत करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Implement suggestions by MCDR committee","description":"Implement    suggestions    given    by    MCDR committee based on their review","lang-hi-name":"MCDR समिति द्वारा दिए गए सुझावों को कार्यान्वित करती है","lang-hi-description":"MCDR समिति द्वारा दिए गए सुझावों को कार्यान्वित करती है"}]

247.name: Epidemiology
247.description: Elaborates the principles of epidemiology and various epidemiological methods as a part of community health nursing practice.

additionalProperties.subject: Community Health Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: महामारी विज्ञान
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: महामारी विज्ञान
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Remembers the concept of epidemiology","description":"Remembers the concept of epidemiology while practicing community health nursing:                                                                                                                                                    -Remembers the definition, aims of epidemiology.                                          -Remembers the definition and examples of communicable and non-communicable diseases                                                         -Remembers different tools of measurement in epidemiology","lang-hi-name":"महामारी विज्ञान की अवधारणा को याद करती है","lang-hi-description":"महामारी विज्ञान की अवधारणा को याद करती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands uses of epidemiology","description":"-Possesses basic understanding of various tools of measurement in epidemiology including rates, ratio, proportion, incidence, and prevalence of disease.                                                                                                                                       -Understands use of epidemiology with regards to disease cycle including source,  reservoir and modes of disease transmission - direct and indirect method.                                                                                                                                    -Understands spectrum of disease and epidemiological triad including the interaction between agent, host and environment.                           ","lang-hi-name":"महामारी विज्ञान के प्रयोग को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"महामारी विज्ञान के प्रयोग को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Interprets how epidemiology is applied to the prevention and control of diseases","description":"-Elucidates various levels of disease prevention including primordial, primary, secondary and tertiary level of prevention.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        -Describes and interprets the process of immunisation including various immunising agents and national immunisation schedule.                                                                                               -Recognises the significance of immunisation in disease prevention and control inculding active and passive immunisation.                                                                                         -Elaborates ways of control of infectious diseases.                                                                                                                                                                                                                           -Describes disinfection and role of nurse in the application of disinfection process ","lang-hi-name":"रोगों की रोकथाम और नियंत्रण के लिए महामारी विज्ञान को कैसे लागू किया जाता है, इसकी व्याख्या करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगों की रोकथाम और नियंत्रण के लिए महामारी विज्ञान को कैसे लागू किया जाता है, इसकी व्याख्या करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""},{"level":"5","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""}]

248.name: National Health Programs
248.description: Conducts screening and creates awareness about various National Health Programs

additionalProperties.subject: Community Health Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: राष्ट्रीय स्वास्थ्य कार्यक्रम
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: राष्ट्रीय स्वास्थ्य कार्यक्रम
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands various diseases, their symptoms and their complications","description":"Understands HIV/AIDS transmission, treatment care and support
-Understands tuberculosis, how it spreads, its symptoms and Sputum test
-Understands leprosy, its side effects, complications, regularity of treatment etc.
-Understands vector borne diseases, signs, symptoms, treatment care and support
-Understands various conditions leading to avoidable blindness and deafness and screening methods
-Understands various non Communicable diseases (NCDs), their screening (beneficiaries, methods and frequency) and community based assessment checklist
-Understands signs of healthy mouth changes in various age groups, common oral diseases (including Fluorosis), emergency conditions and various side effects of tobaco consuption
-Understands various iodine deficinency disorders, importance of cunsumption of iodised salt
-Understands importance of mental health, common mental disorders","lang-hi-name":"विभिन्न बीमारियों, उनके लक्षणों और उनकी जटिलताओं को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"विभिन्न बीमारियों, उनके लक्षणों और उनकी जटिलताओं को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands contact tracing and screening","description":"Understands pre and post screening test(i.e. Rapid Test) and follow up counselling
-Understands contact tracing, directly Observed Treatment (Dots) and follow up counselling for NTEP/RNTCP
-Understands suspect cases and Multi Drug Therapy (MDT) and follow up counseling for leprosy
-Understands collection of blood slides , Rapid Diagnostic Test and follow up counseling for vector borne diseases
-Understands preventive measures, various services provided under NPPCD and NPCB&VI and possible complications post rehabilitation treatment
-Understands treatment of various NCDs, theircomplications, follow up counselling and NCD Card
-Understands signs and symptoms of various oral diseases, pre referal treatment and preventive measures
-Understands screening of various iodine deficiency disorders, preventive measures and testing of salt for iodine level
-Understands various services provided under national mental health program and recording and mentainance of data","lang-hi-name":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Conducts contact tracing and screening","description":"Conducts pre and post screening and and follow up counselling and maintain a compilation of records for NACP
-Ensures availability of equipments  required for diagnosing disease conditions.
- Manages special clinics organized for specific conditions.
-Plans for strategy in prevention and control of diseases.
-Conducts contact tracing and create awareness for RNTCP/NTEP
-Ensures the continuity of therapeutic regimen by the clients.
-Manages disease conditions as per protocols.
-Administers and monitors second dose onwards to cases refered from PHC/APHC for MDT and record of result in case card for NLEP
-Collects blood slides, conducts Rapid Diagnostic Test and replenishes stocks of slides and drugs as per records for vector borne diseases
-Screens and refers all suspects of blindness and deafness for appropriate treatment to higher facilities and conduct follow ups
-Screens all the beneficiaries and refers the suspects of NCDs and conduct follow ups
-Screens suspected cases for various oral diseases and advise primary precutionary interventions
-Screens suspected cases for various iodine deficiency disorders
-Screens the beneficiaries and refers the suspects of mental disorders to appropriate facilities","lang-hi-name":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग करती है","lang-hi-description":"कान्टैक्ट ट्रेसिंग और स्क्रीनिंग करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Spreads awareness among coworkers and community members","description":"Educates coworkers and community members and support programs (eg ICTCs/ART Centers/ PPTCT Centers/ STI Clinics etc) and provide drugs as recommended by doctors for NACP
-Educates community members and monitor entire treatment cycle of patients(DOTS) and record of result in the treatment card
-Coordinates with ASHA to suspect cases of leprosy, follow up treatment for completion in time and counsel patients and community members
-Administers doses, record results and prevention of breeding places of vectors through IEC and community mobilization
-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures and services provided under NPPCD and NPCB&VI. Create awareness for eye donation in comuunity
-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures, monitor treatment of patients and keep records on NCD card, prescribed reporting format of NPCDCS, NCD Application etc
-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures, cessation of tobaco consumption etc
-Educates community members and patients for preventive measures for iodine deficiency disorders
-Educates community members and patients over importance of mental health, services provided under NMHP","lang-hi-name":"सहकर्मियों और सामुदायिक सदस्यों के बीच जागरूकता फैलाती है","lang-hi-description":"सहकर्मियों और सामुदायिक सदस्यों के बीच जागरूकता फैलाती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Refers patients to higher facility","description":"Assists doctors as and when required and provide referrals to clients with HIV/AIDS
-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients with leprosy
-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients with TB
-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients of VBD
-Refers to higher facility in case of any complication in patients post rehabilitation treatment for blindness and deafness
-Refer to higher facility in case of any complication for patients of NCD
-Provides pre-referal management, refer to higher facility in case of any complications/emergency for iron deficieny disorders 
-Provide pre-referal management, refer to higher facility in case of any complications/emergency for patients with oral hygiene issues
-Follows up with mental disorder patients under rehabilitation treatment and referal if required","lang-hi-name":"रोगियों को उच्च स्वास्थ्य केंद्र रेफर करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगियों को उच्च स्वास्थ्य केंद्र रेफर करती है"}]

249.name: Elderly and PWD care and support
249.description: Provides elderly care and support and provides care, support and benefits to PWDs

additionalProperties.subject: Medical Surgical Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: बुजुर्ग और दिव्यांग जन देखभाल और सहयोग
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: बुजुर्ग और दिव्यांग जन देखभाल और सहयोग
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands elderly diseases and various disabilities and government schemes","description":"Understands the process of ageing
-Is aware of the rights of aged person and the rights of PWDs
-Understands nutritional requirements,environmental modifications, lifestyle and behavioural changes related to old age
-Understands various old age diseases
-Understands various disabilities and their causes, protection of rights, care and support for PWDs
-Understands various government schemes and opportunities for PWDs
-Recognises elderly abuse","lang-hi-name":"बुजुर्गों के रोगों और विभिन्न विकलांगताओं और सरकारी योजनाओं को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"बुजुर्गों के रोगों और विभिन्न विकलांगताओं और सरकारी योजनाओं को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Provides health education and creates awareness","description":"Provides health education to elderly persons
-Provides information to the family/community members on nutritional requirements,environmental modifications, lifestyle and behavioural changes related to old age
- Provides information on various government schemes and opportunities available for PWDs","lang-hi-name":"स्वास्थ्य शिक्षा प्रदान करता है और जागरूकता पैदा करता है","lang-hi-description":"स्वास्थ्य शिक्षा प्रदान करता है और जागरूकता पैदा करता है"},{"level":"3","name":"Provides care and support","description":"Arranges   suitable   callipers   and   supportive devices for elderly
-Identifies PWDs
-Provides care and support to PWDs","lang-hi-name":"देखभाल और सहयोग प्रदान करती है","lang-hi-description":"देखभाल और सहयोग प्रदान करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Creates linkages and community engagement","description":"Develops linkages with other community healthcare providers, support groups and day care centers for old age support
-Spreads awareness amongst family members and community in looking after PWDs
-Creates linkages with support groups 
-Ensures various benefits and concessions are provided to PWDs","lang-hi-name":"संबंध और सामुदायिक भागीदारी पैदा करती है","lang-hi-description":"संबंध और सामुदायिक भागीदारी पैदा करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Refers patients to higher facility","description":"Identifies complications with elderly and PWDs
-Provides       pre-referal       management       of complications
-Refers to appropriate level of facility for care","lang-hi-name":"रोगियों को उच्च स्वास्थ्य केंद्र रेफर करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगियों को उच्च स्वास्थ्य केंद्र रेफर करती है"}]

250.name: Evolution of medicine and pathophysiological mechanism
250.description: Evolution   of   modern   medicine   &   Surgery   and   pathophysiological mechanism of disease

additionalProperties.subject: Medical Surgical Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: चिकित्सा का विकास और रोग-भौतिक तंत्र
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: चिकित्सा का विकास और रोग-भौतिक तंत्र
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands the evolution of modern medicine and surgery","description":"Understands  the  brief  history of  evolution  of modern medicine
-Understands how modern medicine is different from traditional medicine","lang-hi-name":"आधुनिक चिकित्सा और सर्जरी के विकास को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"आधुनिक चिकित्सा और सर्जरी के विकास को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands theory of causation of illness and human response to disease","description":"Understands the theories of illness
-Understands the causation of illness
-Understands illness as human experience
-Understands     germ     theory     of     disease, epidemiological triad and stress factors","lang-hi-name":"रोग के कारण और रोग के प्रति मानव प्रतिक्रिया के सिद्धांत को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"रोग के कारण और रोग के प्रति मानव प्रतिक्रिया के सिद्धांत को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Understands pathophysiological mechanism of disease","description":"Understands inflammatory process, Lines of defence against any disease process, nutritional deficiencies and their association with diseases and correlation between stress and disease and vice-versa
-Understands pathophysiology, symptoms and signs of inflammation, Specific nutritional deficiencies associated with poor wound healing and correlation between stress and pain
-Understands different inflammatory markers and their source of production and drugs used to suppress them, medicines used for wound healing, pain pathway","lang-hi-name":"रोग के रोग-भौतिक तंत्र को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"रोग के रोग-भौतिक तंत्र को समझती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Prepares counselling plan and dietary plan","description":"Prepares      Counselling      plan      for      stress management
-Prepares dietary plan for quick recovery from injuries
-Provides  anti-inflammatory  treatment  against injuries","lang-hi-name":"परामर्श योजना और आहार योजना तैयार करती है","lang-hi-description":"परामर्श योजना और आहार योजना तैयार करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Estimates patient requirement and modifies treatment","description":"Counsels patients to relieve their stress
-Provides pain medication
-Estimates patient's requirement for pain relief
-Modifies treatment plan with doctor","lang-hi-name":"रोगी की आवश्यकताओं का आकलन करती है और इलाज को संशोधित करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगी की आवश्यकताओं का आकलन करती है और इलाज को संशोधित करती है"}]

251.name: Altered Immune response
251.description: Understands  auto-immune  disorders  and  its  management  and  provides nursing care to patients with altered immune response

additionalProperties.subject: Medical Surgical Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: प्रतिरक्षा प्रतिक्रिया में बदलाव
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: प्रतिरक्षा प्रतिक्रिया में बदलाव
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understandsallergy and auto-immune diseases/disorders","description":"Understands Auto immune diseases like Rheumatoid arthritis, SLE, Ankylosing spondylitis and Graft vs host disease
-Understands the signs and symptoms of auto- immune diseases
-Understands the process of history taking and clinical examination to confirm auto-immune dieases","lang-hi-name":"एलर्जी और ऑटोइम्यून रोगों/ विकारों को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"एलर्जी और ऑटोइम्यून रोगों/ विकारों को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands drugs used for treament of auto- immune diseases/disorders","description":"Recognises the drugs used for auto-immune diseases and their mechanism of action
-Understands the categorisation of drugs used as anti allergics eg- Anti histaminics, steroids, immuno-suppressants
-Knows the doses, routes and sites of administration of these drugs","lang-hi-name":"ऑटो-इम्यून रोगों/ विकारों के इलाज के लिए उपयोग की जाने वाली दवाओं को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"ऑटो-इम्यून रोगों/ विकारों के इलाज के लिए उपयोग की जाने वाली दवाओं को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Understands allergy disorders","description":"Understands allergy disorders like anaphylaxis, allergy rhinitis, Contact dermatitis, atopic dermatitis, Drug reactions, Food allergy, Serum sickness, Latex allergyetc
-Understands various approaches to treat allergic diseases 
-Understands ways to treat adverse reactions to drugs/treatment","lang-hi-name":"एलर्जी विकारों को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"एलर्जी विकारों को समझती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Assesses disease/disorder","description":"Elicits history from the patient
-Performs clinical examination to confirm Auto- immune disorders
-Assesses disease based on symptoms and signs, history, examination and lab tests","lang-hi-name":"रोग/ विकार का आकलन करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोग/ विकार का आकलन करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Administers drugs","description":"Provides  emergency  management  to  allergic conditions
-Administers drugs as per medical prescription
-Identifies any adverse reactions to these drugs
-Changes treatment based on adverse reactions","lang-hi-name":"दवाएं देती है","lang-hi-description":"दवाएं देती है"}]

252.name: Fluid and electrolyte imbalance
252.description: Understands  fluid  and  electrolyte  imbalance  and  its  management  and provides nursing care to client

additionalProperties.subject: Medical Surgical Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: फ्लूड और इलेक्ट्रोलाइट असंतुलन
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: फ्लूड और इलेक्ट्रोलाइट असंतुलन
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands fluid and electrolyte balance","description":"Understands water homeostatsis
-Understands buffere system
-Understands    electrolyte    and    Acid–    Base balance
-Knows the normal range of serum electrolytes and ABG
-Understands types of fluids","lang-hi-name":"फ्लूड और इलेक्ट्रोलाइट संतुलन को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"फ्लूड और इलेक्ट्रोलाइट संतुलन को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands management protocols","description":"Understands the mechanism of regulating fluid and electrolyte movement
-Understands  fluid  and  electrolyte  acid-base imbalance
-Understands  the  management  of  fluid  and electrolyte imbalance
-Understands causes of electrolyes imbalances and fluid loss","lang-hi-name":"प्रबंधन प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"प्रबंधन प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Understands signs and symptoms of imbalance and clinical examinations used","description":"Knows about symptoms and signs in a patient with fluid and electrolyte imbalance
-Understands the protocol for history taking to identify fluid and electrolyte imbalance
-Understands     the     protocol     for     clinical examinations to identify fluid and electrolyte","lang-hi-name":"असंतुलन के संकेतों और लक्षणों तथा प्रयोग किए गए क्लीनिकल परीक्षण को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"असंतुलन के संकेतों और लक्षणों तथा प्रयोग किए गए क्लीनिकल परीक्षण को समझती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Identifies fluid and electrolyte imbalance","description":"Identifies fluid and electrolyte imbalance in a patient based on symptoms, signs, history and clinical examinations
-Interprets results based on serum electrolytes in a patient
-Identifies management protocol","lang-hi-name":"फ्लूड और इलेक्ट्रोलाइट असंतुलन की पहचान करती है","lang-hi-description":"फ्लूड और इलेक्ट्रोलाइट असंतुलन की पहचान करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Manages patient","description":"Manages   patient   for   fluid   and   electrolyte imbalance
-Creates intake-output chart
-Monitors the intake-output chart
-Titrates fluid requirement as per findings
-Provides drug management to maintain electrolyte balance ","lang-hi-name":"रोगी का प्रबंधन करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगी का प्रबंधन करती है"}]

253.name: OT protocols
253.description: Knows the infection prevention protocols for Operation Theatre

additionalProperties.subject: Medical Surgical Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: ओटी प्रोटोकॉल
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: ओटी प्रोटोकॉल
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands protocols for Surgical handwashing and PPE donning-doffing","description":"Understands the importance of disinfection of OT and pre-op ward
-Understands   the   Chemicals   in   appropriate strenghth used for disinfection of OT
-Recognises  the  cleaning  protocols  of  tables, trolleys, lights and other equipments of OT","lang-hi-name":"सर्जिकल हाथ धोने और पीपीई पहनने के प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"सर्जिकल हाथ धोने और पीपीई पहनने के प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands the protocols for disinfecting OT and its equipments","description":"Understands the importance of Surgical hand- washing
-Knows the steps of surgical hand-washing
-Knows the steps of PPE Donning-Doffing","lang-hi-name":"ओटी और उसके उपकरणों के कीटाणुशोधन के प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"ओटी और उसके उपकरणों के कीटाणुशोधन के प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Understands sterilisation of instruments and lenins","description":"Understands the importance of sterilization of OT and equipments
-Understands the Chemicals in appropriate strenghth used for sterilization of OT
-Recognises the sterilization protocols for OT equipments
-Understands the importance of sterilization of lenin and instruments
-Knows the various methods of physical and chemical sterilization of lenins and instruments
-Knows how to wrap instruments, linen and operate autoclave","lang-hi-name":"उपकरणों और लेनिन के स्टरिलाइजेशन को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"उपकरणों और लेनिन के स्टरिलाइजेशन को समझती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Performs handwashing, OT disinfection and sterilisation","description":"Performs surgical hand-washing and Donning- Doffing of PPE
-Cleans equipments of OT as per protocol
-Performs  OT  sterilization  periodically as  per protocol
-Packs and sterilizes lenin and instruments in autoclave","lang-hi-name":"हाथ धोती है, ओटी कीटाणुशोधन करती है और स्टरिलाइज करती है","lang-hi-description":"हाथ धोती है, ओटी कीटाणुशोधन करती है और स्टरिलाइज करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Supervises other staff on OT protocols and maintains OT","description":"Ensures that entire surgical adheres to the handwashing and donning-doffing of PPE protocol
-Supervises the ancillary staff in disinfection of the OT equipment
-Organizes OT as per 4 zones and send periodic OT swabs
-Maintains records of instruments, equipment and lenins by using chemical and biological indicators","lang-hi-name":"ओटी प्रोटोकॉल पर अन्य कर्मचारियों का पर्यवेक्षण करती है और ओटी को व्यवस्थित रखती है","lang-hi-description":"ओटी प्रोटोकॉल पर अन्य कर्मचारियों का पर्यवेक्षण करती है और ओटी को व्यवस्थित रखती है"}]

254.name: Pre, intra and post-op care
254.description: Provides appropriate Pre-op care, prepare patients for Surgery, prepares the logistics (drugs and equipment) required for surgery and provides post-op care

additionalProperties.subject: Medical Surgical Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: ऑपरेशन से पहले, ऑपरेशन के दौरान और ऑपरेशन के बाद देखभाल
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: ऑपरेशन से पहले, ऑपरेशन के दौरान और ऑपरेशन के बाद देखभाल
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands pre-op care","description":"Understands  the components/protocols  of pre- op care
-Understands  the logistics required for pre-op care
-Knows the do's and don’t's of pre op care","lang-hi-name":"ऑपरेशन से पहले देखभाल को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"ऑपरेशन से पहले देखभाल को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands intra- operative management","description":"Knows about anaesthetic drugs, instruments
-Knows  the  drug  names,  dose,  and  route  for different types of anaesthesia
-Recognises    instruments    and    sutures    for different types of surgeries
-Recognises    the    safe    surgical    and    safe anaesthesia checklist","lang-hi-name":"ऑपरेशन के दौरान प्रबंधन को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"ऑपरेशन के दौरान प्रबंधन को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Understands post-op care","description":"Understands the protocols of immediate care after surgery (keeping wound clean & dry, managing swelling etc.)
-Knows about transfer protocols while transferring patient from OT to ward (or recovery room)
-Understands the time taken to recover after specific anaesthetic drug injection","lang-hi-name":"ऑपरेशन के बाद की देखभाल को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"ऑपरेशन के बाद की देखभाल को समझती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Performs pre-op and intra-operative care","description":"Takes written consent from patient
-Provides pre-medications
-Prepares the patients physically and emotionally
-Provides care of invasive and non-invasive catheters
-Identifies any deviations from prescribed pre- op instructions, eg- patient is not nil oral, shifted to OT without written consent,  case file not sent with the patient etc.
-Prepares anaesthesia trolley and surgical trolley for the assigned surgery","lang-hi-name":"ऑपरेशन से पहले और ऑपरेशन के दौरान देखभाल करती है","lang-hi-description":"ऑपरेशन से पहले और ऑपरेशन के दौरान देखभाल करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Peforms post-op care and manages if any complications","description":"Performs post operative observation and nursing care
-Follows post operative orders provided by the surgical head
-Observes     and     identifies     any     post-op complications, prevention and management
-Fills safe surgical checklist for every surgery","lang-hi-name":"ऑपरेशन के बाद देखभाल करती है और किसी भी जटिलता का प्रबंधन करती है","lang-hi-description":"ऑपरेशन के बाद देखभाल करती है और किसी भी जटिलता का प्रबंधन करती है"}]

255.name: Respiratory disorders
255.description: Understands the respiratory system, various respiratory disorders and their management

additionalProperties.subject: Medical Surgical Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: श्वसन संबंधी विकार
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: श्वसन संबंधी विकार
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands the respiratory system","description":"Understands the structure of respiratory organs
-Understands  the  functions  of  the  respiratory organs
-Understands the physiology of respiration
-Understands   the   characteristics   of   normal respiration and deviation","lang-hi-name":"श्वसन तंत्र को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"श्वसन तंत्र को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands the symtoms of respiratory disorders and their management","description":"Knows symptom/signs of Upper Respiratory tract disorders
-Knows management protocols for upper respiratory tract disorders
-Knows symptom/signs of Lower Respiratory tract disorders
-Knows management protocols for lower respiratory tract disorders
-Knows about conditions that may lead to respiratory failure
-Knows symptom/signs of respiratory failure
-Knows management protocols for respiratory failure
-Knows about relevant history taking, physical examinations and sample taken for investigations","lang-hi-name":"श्वसन विकारों के लक्षणों और उनके प्रबंधन को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"श्वसन विकारों के लक्षणों और उनके प्रबंधन को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Conducts assessments","description":"Conducts upper respiratory tract disorders assessments and investigations (history, physical examination)
-Conducts lower respiratory tract disorders assessments and investigations (history, physical examination)
-Conducts respiratory failure assessments and investigations (history, physical examination)
-Draws sample for ABG 
-Reports of investigations and diagnostic procedures","lang-hi-name":"मूल्यांकन करती है","lang-hi-description":"मूल्यांकन करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Diagnostic evaluation","description":"Interprets results from investigations and identifies cases of Upper Respiratory tract disorders
-Interprets results from investigations and identifies cases of Lower Respiratory tract disorders
-Interprets result of Lung function tests/investigations and identifies respiratory failure
-Interprets the diagnostic procedures like PFT, LFT and ABG values and other investigations.","lang-hi-name":"नैदानिक मूल्यांकन","lang-hi-description":"नैदानिक मूल्यांकन"},{"level":"5","name":"Manages respiratory disorders","description":"Manages patients with Upper Respiratory tract disorders as per prescription of doctor(eg- Nasal drops, Steam inhalation etc)
-Manages patients with Lower Respiratory tract disorders using drugs and other artificial respiratory devices
-Manages patients with respiratory failure by providing artificial ventilation (eg through CPAP, BiPAP, Ventilator)
-Provides drug management","lang-hi-name":"श्वसन विकारों का इलाज करती है","lang-hi-description":"श्वसन विकारों का इलाज करती है"}]

[{"level":"1","name":"Understands structure and function of cells","description":"Understands the structure and characteristics of normal cells

-Understands the structure and characteristics of cancer cells
-Understands common malignancies of various body systems (eg- Oral, lung, stomach, larynx, breast, cervix,uterus, prostate etc.)","lang-hi-name":"कोशिकाओं की संरचना और कार्य को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"कोशिकाओं की संरचना और कार्य को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands signs and symptoms of cancer","description":"Understands prevention of cancer
-Understands screening and early detection of cancer
-Understands early warning signs of cancer
-Understands     epidemology,     etiology     and classification of cancer","lang-hi-name":"कैंसर के संकेतों और लक्षणों को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"कैंसर के संकेतों और लक्षणों को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Understands management of oncological disorders","description":"Knows about relevant history taking, physical examinations and sample taken for investigations 
-Understands various treatment modalities (eg- Immunotherapy, Radio, chemo, surgical etc.)
-Understands oncology emergency
-Understands the psychosocial aspects of cancer

279.name: Concept of community health and community health nursing

additionalProperties.subject: Community Health Nursing

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Remembers the concept of community health nursing","description":"Remembers the concept of health and disease
-Remembers the dimensions and indicators of health and health determinants
-Remembers the definitions of community, community health and community health nursing","lang-hi-name":"सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य देखभाल की अवधारणा को याद रखती है","lang-hi-description":"सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य देखभाल की अवधारणा को याद रखती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands the primary health care;  promotion of health and prevention of disease for maintenance of health","description":"Understands the history and development of community health in india and its present concept
-Understands the promotion of health and prevention of illness for the maintenance of health
-Understands primary healthcare, millennium development goals and sustainable development goal                  ","lang-hi-name":"प्राथमिक स्वास्थ्य देखभाल; स्वास्थ्य को बढ़ावा देना और स्वास्थ्य के रखरखाव के लिए बीमारी की रोकथाम को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"प्राथमिक स्वास्थ्य देखभाल; स्वास्थ्य को बढ़ावा देना और स्वास्थ्य के रखरखाव के लिए बीमारी की रोकथाम को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Interprets role of nurses in Community health nursing","description":"Interprets the importance of communtiy health nursing and its goals and objectives and principles

-Outlines and distinguishes care needs of high to low priority as per Community health nursing process","lang-hi-name":"सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य नर्सिंग में नर्सों की भूमिका की व्याख्या करती है","lang-hi-description":"सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य नर्सिंग में नर्सों की भूमिका की व्याख्या करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""},{"level":"5","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""}]

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands the importance of health environment and its reation to health and disease","description":"Remembers the components of environment
-Remembers   the   importance   of   a   health environment","lang-hi-name":"स्वास्थ्य पर्यावरण के महत्व और स्वास्थ्य एवं बीमारी के प्रति इसकी प्रतिक्रिया को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"स्वास्थ्य पर्यावरण के महत्व और स्वास्थ्य एवं बीमारी के प्रति इसकी प्रतिक्रिया को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands the various environmental factors contributing to health","description":"Understands the various environmental factors contributing to health
-Understands the sources and characteristics of safe and wholesome water, the uses of water, rain water harvesting, water pollution, water borne diseases and water purification
-Understands the composition of air, airborne diseases, air pollution and its effect on health and control of air pollution and use of safety measures
-Understands the refuse system, the health hazards of waste and waste management
-Understands the type and location of housing, characteristics of good housing, basic amenities and town planning
-Understands ventilition and the types and standards of ventilition
-Understands lighting, requirement of good lighting, natural and artificial lighting and the use of solar energy
-Understands the sources of noise, community noise levels, effects of noise pollution and noise control measures
-Understands arthopods and their control measures
-Understands zoonotic diseases among the community and their control measures","lang-hi-name":"स्वास्थ्य में योगदान देने वाले विभिन्न पर्यावरणीय कारकों को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"स्वास्थ्य में योगदान देने वाले विभिन्न पर्यावरणीय कारकों को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Recognises the community organisations","description":"Recognises the various community organizations to promote environmental health
-Recognises the levels (national, state, local) and the types of agencies (government, voluntary, social)
-Recognises legislations and acts regulating the environmental hygien","lang-hi-name":"सामुदायिक संस्थाओं को पहचानती है","lang-hi-description":"सामुदायिक संस्थाओं को पहचानती है"},{"level":"4","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""},{"level":"5","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""}]

-Demonstrates using multimedia

","lang-hi-name":"दैनिक उपयोग में एमएस ऑफिस के उपयोग का प्रदर्शन करती है","lang-hi-description":"दैनिक उपयोग में एमएस ऑफिस के उपयोग का प्रदर्शन करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Analyses data using advanced skills","description":"Able to analyse the data on Excel

","lang-hi-name":"उन्नत कौशल का उपयोग करके डेटा का विश्लेषण करती है","lang-hi-description":"उन्नत कौशल का उपयोग करके डेटा का विश्लेषण करती है"}]

285.name: Health systems and community health services
285.description: Understands the health system and health care services, health problems, national health programs, specialised community health services, demography and family welfare and health information system

additionalProperties.subject: Community Health Nursing
additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली और सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली और सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Remembers the health system in India and the health care delivery system","description":"Remembers the organsation and administration of health system in India (central, state and district)
-Remembers the health care delivery system (health care concept and trens)
-Remembers the health care services (public sector, rural and urban)
-Remembers private sector health, PPP, AYUSH, voluntary health services, National health programs and the nurses role in health care services
-Remembers health planning in india (national health planning, 5 year plans, health committees and reports and NHP
-Remembers the various internation health agencies
-Remembers the various national agencies
-Remembers the Indian council for child welfare, FP association of India and other NGOs","lang-hi-name":"भारत में स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली और स्वास्थ्य देखभाल वितरण प्रणाली को याद करती है","lang-hi-description":"भारत में स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली और स्वास्थ्य देखभाल वितरण प्रणाली को याद करती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands specialised community health services and the major health problems in India","description":"Understands the different  specialised community health services and nurses role (RCH, NHM, JSSK, emergency ambulance services)
-Understands government health insurance schemes, school health services, occupational health nursing, geriatric nursing, care of differently abled and rehabilitation nursing
-Understands the major health problems in India (communicable diseases, non-communicable, nutritional problems, environmental sanitation and population)","lang-hi-name":"भारत में विशिष्ट सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य सेवाओं और प्रमुख स्वास्थ्य समस्याओं को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"भारत में विशिष्ट सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य सेवाओं और प्रमुख स्वास्थ्य समस्याओं को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Recognises the concept of health and demography and the national family welfare programmes","description":"Recognises the concept of demography (concept, trends, fertility and infertility and small family norm)
-Recognises family welfare (concept, importance, aims and objectives, FP methods and FP counselling
-Recognises the National family welfare policy
-Recognises the national familu welfare programme","lang-hi-name":"स्वास्थ्य और जनसांख्यिकी और राष्ट्रीय परिवार कल्याण कार्यक्रमों की अवधारणा को मान्यता देती है","lang-hi-description":"स्वास्थ्य और जनसांख्यिकी और राष्ट्रीय परिवार कल्याण कार्यक्रमों की अवधारणा को मान्यता देती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Interprets role of nursing at different levels and uses of health information systems","description":"Interprets the role of nursing personnel at various levels (District PHN officer, Block health nurse, PHN, LHV/health supervisor and helath worker female/ANM
-Interprets vital statistics of helath information systems and various rates and indicators
-Develop strategies to provide care to specialised community health services
-Interprets basic statistical methods and descriptive methods","lang-hi-name":"विभिन्न स्तरों पर नर्सिंग की भूमिका और स्वास्थ्य सूचना प्रणालियों के उपयोग की व्याख्या करती है","lang-hi-description":"विभिन्न स्तरों पर नर्सिंग की भूमिका और स्वास्थ्य सूचना प्रणालियों के उपयोग की व्याख्या करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""}]

-Interprets the clinical teaching methods (case method, bed side clinic, nursing rounds, nursing conference and process recording","lang-hi-name":"शिक्षण के तरीकों की व्याख्या करती है","lang-hi-description":"शिक्षण के तरीकों की व्याख्या करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Able to operate basic mannequins","description":"Know the different types of mannequins, their use and maintenance","lang-hi-name":"बुनियादी मॉडल संचालित करने में सक्षम है","lang-hi-description":"बुनियादी मॉडल संचालित करने में सक्षम है"},{"level":"5","name":"Able to provide skill based teaching","description":"Able to use different mannequins and instruments to provide skills based training ","lang-hi-name":"कौशल आधारित शिक्षण प्रदान करने में सक्षम है","lang-hi-description":"कौशल आधारित शिक्षण प्रदान करने में सक्षम है"}]

287.name: Midwifery and obstretrical nursing

additionalProperties.lang-hi-name: मिडवाइफरी और प्रसव-नर्सिंग
additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: मिडवाइफरी और प्रसव-नर्सिंग
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Remembers the various obstretric operations","description":"Remembers the definition of midwifery and obstretrical nursing
-Remembers the history of midwifery
-Remembers the trends and vital statistics related to maternal health in India
-Remembers the definition of obstretric operations
-Remembers the definition and indication of induction of labour, manual removal of placenta, version, forceps delivery, forceps delivery, vacuum extraction, caesarian section, sterilisation, destructive surgeries, amnio infusion, manual vaccum aspiration, dilatation and evacuation, dilatation and curettage
-Remembers post abortion care","lang-hi-name":"विभिन्न प्रसूति ऑपरेशनों को याद करती है","lang-hi-description":"विभिन्न प्रसूति ऑपरेशनों को याद करती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands the role of a midwife in assisting a clinical practioner","description":"Understands the basic competencies of a midwife
-Understands the role of a midwife in assisting during induction of labour, manual removal of placenta, version, forceps delivery, forceps delivery, vacuum extraction, caesarian section, sterilisation, destructive surgeries, amnio infusion, manual vaccum aspiration, dilatation and evacuation, dilatation and curettage
-Understands the role of a midwife in assisting during post abortion care","lang-hi-name":"क्लिनिकल प्रैक्टिशनर की सहायता में मिडवाइफ की भूमिका को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"क्लिनिकल प्रैक्टिशनर की सहायता में मिडवाइफ की भूमिका को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Interprets the drugs used in obstretrics","description":"Interprets the indication, dose, action, contraindication, side effects and responsibilities in the administration of drugs used in obstretrics
-Interprets the indication, dose, action, contraindication, side effects and responsibilities in the administration of drugs used for newborns
-Interprets the effects of drugs on mother and newborn- teratogens","lang-hi-name":"प्रसूति में उपयोग की जाने वाली दवाओं की व्याख्या करती है","lang-hi-description":"प्रसूति में उपयोग की जाने वाली दवाओं की व्याख्या करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Assists the clinical practioner","description":"Assists the clinical practioner during induction of labour, manual removal of placenta, version, forceps delivery, forceps delivery, vacuum extraction, caesarian section, sterilisation, destructive surgeries, amnio infusion, manual vaccum aspiration, dilatation and evacuation, dilatation and curettage
-Asssists the clinical practioner during post abortion care
-Assists the clinical practioner in the administration of drugs","lang-hi-name":"क्लीनिकल प्रैक्टिशनर की मदद करती है","lang-hi-description":"क्लीनिकल प्रैक्टिशनर की मदद करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Maintains records and files","description":"Maintains record of procedures done","lang-hi-name":"रिकार्ड का रखरखाव करती है और फाइल बनाती है","lang-hi-description":"रिकार्ड का रखरखाव करती है और फाइल बनाती है"}]

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands the concept of child health care","description":"Remembers the modern concept in child health care
-Remembers the trends in pediatric nursing
-Remembers the emerging challenges, nursing process related to pediatric nursing
-Remembers the concept of preventive pediatric
-Remembers   the   vital   statistics   related   to pediatrics as per NRHS and GOI","lang-hi-name":"बच्चे के स्वास्थ्य की अवधारणा को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"बच्चे के स्वास्थ्य की अवधारणा को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands the definitions and principles of growth and development","description":" Understands the definition, principles, and factors affecting growth and development.
-Understand the growth and development of Infant.
-Understand the growth and development of a toddler
-Understand the growth and development of preschoolers
-Understand the growth and development of school age
-Understand the growth and development of adolescents
-Recognises child welfare services and the role of the nurse in clinics, hospitals and community","lang-hi-name":"विकास और विकास की परिभाषाओं और सिद्धांतों को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"विकास और विकास की परिभाषाओं और सिद्धांतों को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Recognises various child welfare services and agencies and laws pertaining to pediatrics","description":"Recognises the various child welfare services and agencies (ICDS, mid-day meal program, balwadi, anganwadi, day care centres and NPSP)

-Recognises the roles of nurses in pediatrics","lang-hi-name":"बाल कल्याण संबंधी विभिन्न सेवाओं और एजेंसियों तथा बाल चिकित्सा से संबंधित कानूनों को पहचानती है","lang-hi-description":"बाल कल्याण संबंधी विभिन्न सेवाओं और एजेंसियों तथा बाल चिकित्सा से संबंधित कानूनों को पहचानती है"},{"level":"4","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""},{"level":"5","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""}]

-Remembers   the   misconceptions   related   to mental illness

-Understands the trends in psychiatric nursing
-Understands     the     types     of     psychiatric emergencies
-Understands  suicide,  adverse  drug  reactions, withdrawal symptoms, acute psychosis, etc
-Understands crisis and its intervention: AIDS, Adoloscent crisis","lang-hi-name":"मनोचिकित्सा के इतिहास को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"मनोचिकित्सा के इतिहास को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Recognises the legal aspects to be kept in mind while caring for mentally ill patients","description":"Recognises the India lunatic act 1912
-Recognises the narcostics drugs and psychotropic act 1965
-Recognises the mental health act 1987,2014
-Recognises the admission and discharge procedures 
-Recognises the standared of psychiatric nursing practice
-Recognises the rights of mentally ill patients
-Recognises the legal responsibilities in the care of mentally ill patients","lang-hi-name":"मानसिक रोगियों की देखभाल करते समय कानूनी पहलुओं को ध्यान में रखती है","lang-hi-description":"मानसिक रोगियों की देखभाल करते समय कानूनी पहलुओं को ध्यान में रखती है"},{"level":"4","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""},{"level":"5","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""}]

-Understands tumors, amputation and prosthesis
-Understands deformities-congenital and acquired","lang-hi-name":"विभिन्न मांसपेशी और कंकाल संबंधी विकारों और रोगों को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"विभिन्न मांसपेशी और कंकाल संबंधी विकारों और रोगों को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Recognises assessments and therapies and drugs used to care for musculo skeletal disorders and diseases","description":"Recognises assessments (history taking, physical examination and diagnostic tests) of musculo skeletal disorders and diseases

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Remembers the concept of family health nursing. ","description":"Remembers the concept of family health nursing:--Remembers family as a unit of health.-Remembers definition, goals and objectives of family health nursing.","lang-hi-name":"पारिवारिक स्वास्थ्य नर्सिंग की अवधारणा को याद रखती है। ","lang-hi-description":"पारिवारिक स्वास्थ्य नर्सिंग की अवधारणा को याद रखती है। "},{"level":"2","name":"Understands family health care services","description":"-Understands the significance  of nursing process as a part of family health services - Understands the role of family in the promotion, prevention and maintainance of health -Understands various family health services including maternal, child care and family welfare services.                    ","lang-hi-name":"पारिवारिक स्वास्थ्य देखभाल सेवाओं को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"पारिवारिक स्वास्थ्य देखभाल सेवाओं को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Interprets the roles and functions of a community health nurse in family health service.","description":"-Elucidates the application of nursing proces: nursing assessment, nursing diagnosis (with focus on family diagnosis), planning, implementation and evaluation while providing care in the community. -Facilitates in rendering family health services including maternal, child and family welfare services.-Interprets the significance and components of family health records.Describes the purposes, principles, planning and evaluation of family health care settings home visits.Recognises and explains the purposes, types of clinics and their functions.Describes functions of health personnel in clinics.                                                                  ","lang-hi-name":"पारिवारिक स्वास्थ्य सेवा में सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य नर्स की भूमिकाओं और कार्यों की व्याख्या करती है।","lang-hi-description":"पारिवारिक स्वास्थ्य सेवा में सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य नर्स की भूमिकाओं और कार्यों की व्याख्या करती है।"},{"level":"4","name":"Demonstrates principles and techniques of family health care services at home and in clinics. ","description":"-Applies the priniciples and fucntions of health personnel at home visits and in clinics.Exhibits skillful demonstration of bag technique including application of priniciples, procedure while utilsiing nurse's responsibilities and maintainaing record keeping. ","lang-hi-name":"घर और क्लीनिक में पारिवारिक स्वास्थ्य देखभाल सेवाओं के सिद्धांतों और तकनीकों का प्रदर्शन करती है। ","lang-hi-description":"घर और क्लीनिक में पारिवारिक स्वास्थ्य देखभाल सेवाओं के सिद्धांतों और तकनीकों का प्रदर्शन करती है। "},{"level":"5","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""}]

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands structure and function of cells","description":"Understands the structure and characteristics of normal cells
-Understands basic cell cycle
-Understands the structure and characteristics of cancer cells
-Understands common malignancies of various body systems (eg- Oral, lung, stomach, larynx, breast, cervix,uterus, prostate etc.)","lang-hi-name":"कोशिकाओं की संरचना और कार्य को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"कोशिकाओं की संरचना और कार्य को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands signs and symptoms of cancer","description":"Understands prevention of cancer
-Understands screening and early detection of cancer
-Understands early warning signs of cancer
-Understands     epidemology,     etiology     and classification of cancer","lang-hi-name":"कैंसर के संकेतों और लक्षणों को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"कैंसर के संकेतों और लक्षणों को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Understands management of oncological disorders","description":"Knows about relevant history taking, physical examinations and sample taken for investigations 
-Understands various treatment modalities (eg- Immunotherapy, Radio, chemo, surgical etc.)
-Understands oncology emergency
-Understands the psychosocial aspects of cancer
-Understands rehabilitation 
-Understands palliatiev care
-Understands various therapies for oncological disorders","lang-hi-name":"ऑन्कोलॉजिकल विकारों के प्रबंधन को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"ऑन्कोलॉजिकल विकारों के प्रबंधन को समझती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Conducts assessment and identifies treament","description":"Conducts     assessments     and     investigations (history, physical examination)
-Identifies  common  malignancies  after  taking history, physical examination and investigations
-Identifies   type   of   treatment   required   for oncological disorders","lang-hi-name":"मूल्यांकन करती है और इलाज की पहचान करती है","lang-hi-description":"मूल्यांकन करती है और इलाज की पहचान करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Manages patient","description":"Provides  Rehabilitative  and  palliative  care  to patient
-Provides treatment as per doctors prescription
-Provides any drugs/alternate therapies, as per doctors prescription
-Manages complications","lang-hi-name":"रोगी का प्रबंधन करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगी का प्रबंधन करती है"}]

-Understands the composition of blood and its functions
-Understands the conduction system and cardiac cycle
-Understands systemic and pulmonary circulation","lang-hi-name":"रक्त परिसंचरण प्रणाली को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"रक्त परिसंचरण प्रणाली को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands signs and symptoms of diseases","description":"Understands the signs and symptoms associated with disease and disorders of Cardio-vascular system (eg- CAD, Arrythmia, Valvular heart disease, Inflammation and infections, Cardiac emergencies, Vascular disorders, Venous disorders)
-Understands the signs and  symptoms associated with Hematological disorders (eg- Anaemia, Thalassemia, Polycythemia, Leukemia, Lymphomas, Bleeding disorders, coagulopathies etc.)
-Understands functions of heart and vascular system","lang-hi-name":"रोगों के संकेतों और लक्षणों को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगों के संकेतों और लक्षणों को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Understands assessment","description":"Knows the various examinations and diagnostic tests conducted for cardio-vascular diseases and disorders
-Knows the various examinations and diagnostic tests conducted for hemotological diseases and disorders
-Knows the normal range of various blood components","lang-hi-name":"जांच को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"जांच को समझती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Conducts assessment and identifies disease","description":"Conducts assessments and investigations (history, physical examination) to identify cardio-vascular diseases and disorders
-Identifies cardio-vascular diseases and disorders based upon history, examination and diagnostic tests
-Conducts assessments and investigations (history, physical examination) to identify hematological diseases and disorders
-Identifies hematological diseases and disorders based upon history, examination and diagnostic tests","lang-hi-name":"आकलन करती है और बीमारी की पहचान करती है","lang-hi-description":"आकलन करती है और बीमारी की पहचान करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Manages patient","description":"Provides nursing care, medical care for cardio-vascular diseases and disorders
-Assists in giving alternate therapies as per doctor's prescription for cardio-vascular diseases and disorders
-Provides nursing care, medical care for hematological diseases and disorders
-Assists in giving alternate therapies as per doctor's prescription for hematological diseases and disorders","lang-hi-name":"रोगी का प्रबंधन करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगी का प्रबंधन करती है"}]

additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: श्वसन संबंधी विकार
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands the respiratory system","description":"Understands the structure of respiratory organs
-Understands  the  functions  of  the  respiratory organs
-Understands the physiology of respiration
-Understands   the   characteristics   of   normal respiration and deviation","lang-hi-name":"श्वसन तंत्र को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"श्वसन तंत्र को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands the symtoms of respiratory disorders and their management","description":"Knows symptom/signs of Upper Respiratory tract disorders
-Knows management protocols for upper respiratory tract disorders
-Knows symptom/signs of Lower Respiratory tract disorders
-Knows management protocols for lower respiratory tract disorders
-Knows about conditions that may lead to respiratory failure
-Knows symptom/signs of respiratory failure
-Knows management protocols for respiratory failure
-Knows about relevant history taking, physical examinations and sample taken for investigations","lang-hi-name":"श्वसन विकारों के लक्षणों और उनके प्रबंधन को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"श्वसन विकारों के लक्षणों और उनके प्रबंधन को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Conducts assessments","description":"Conducts upper respiratory tract disorders assessments and investigations (history, physical examination)
-Conducts lower respiratory tract disorders assessments and investigations (history, physical examination)
-Conducts respiratory failure assessments and investigations (history, physical examination)
-Draws sample for ABG 
-Reports of investigations and diagnostic procedures","lang-hi-name":"मूल्यांकन करती है","lang-hi-description":"मूल्यांकन करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Diagnostic evaluation","description":"Interprets results from investigations and identifies cases of Upper Respiratory tract disorders
-Interprets results from investigations and identifies cases of Lower Respiratory tract disorders
-Interprets result of Lung function tests/investigations and identifies respiratory failure
-Interprets the diagnostic procedures like PFT, LFT and ABG values and other investigations.","lang-hi-name":"नैदानिक मूल्यांकन","lang-hi-description":"नैदानिक मूल्यांकन"},{"level":"5","name":"Manages respiratory disorders","description":"Manages patients with Upper Respiratory tract disorders as per prescription of doctor(eg- Nasal drops, Steam inhalation etc)
-Manages patients with Lower Respiratory tract disorders using drugs and other artificial respiratory devices
-Manages patients with respiratory failure by providing artificial ventilation (eg through CPAP, BiPAP, Ventilator)
-Provides drug management","lang-hi-name":"श्वसन विकारों का इलाज करती है","lang-hi-description":"श्वसन विकारों का इलाज करती है"}]

 -knows the tests to be done during pregnancy

-Knows about types and classification of burns
-Understands     pathophysiology,     local     and systemic effects of burn","lang-hi-name":"विकारों और जलन को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"विकारों और जलन को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Understands assessment and complications","description":"Knows about relevant history taking, physical examinations and sample taken for investigations 
-Knows about plastic & reconstructive surgery
-Has knowledge of skin graft flaps and types of skin grafts (eg-aotu, allo and xenograft)
-Knows about possible complications after performing various grafts
-Knows about etiology and pathophysiology of various skin disorders","lang-hi-name":"मूल्यांकन और जटिलताओं को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"मूल्यांकन और जटिलताओं को समझती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Conducts assessment","description":"Conducts assessments and investigations (history, physical examination) to identify skin disorders

-Performs immediate care and First aid care after burn

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription: [{"level":"1","name":"Remembers the concept of epidemiology","description":"Remembers the concept of epidemiology while practicing community health nursing:                                                                                                                                                    -Remembers the definition, aims of epidemiology.                                          -Remembers the definition and examples of communicable and non-communicable diseases                                                         -Remembers different tools of measurement in epidemiology","lang-hi-name":"महामारी विज्ञान की अवधारणा को याद करती है","lang-hi-description":"महामारी विज्ञान की अवधारणा को याद करती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands uses of epidemiology","description":"-Possesses basic understanding of various tools of measurement in epidemiology including rates, ratio, proportion, incidence, and prevalence of disease.                                                                                                                                       -Understands use of epidemiology with regards to disease cycle including source,  reservoir and modes of disease transmission - direct and indirect method.                                                                                                                                    -Understands spectrum of disease and epidemiological triad including the interaction between agent, host and environment.                           ","lang-hi-name":"महामारी विज्ञान के प्रयोग को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"महामारी विज्ञान के प्रयोग को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Interprets how epidemiology is applied to the prevention and control of diseases","description":"-Elucidates various levels of disease prevention including primordial, primary, secondary and tertiary level of prevention.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        -Describes and interprets the process of immunisation including various immunising agents and national immunisation schedule.                                                                                               -Recognises the significance of immunisation in disease prevention and control inculding active and passive immunisation.                                                                                         -Elaborates ways of control of infectious diseases.                                                                                                                                                                                                                           -Describes disinfection and role of nurse in the application of disinfection process ","lang-hi-name":"रोगों की रोकथाम और नियंत्रण के लिए महामारी विज्ञान को कैसे लागू किया जाता है, इसकी व्याख्या करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगों की रोकथाम और नियंत्रण के लिए महामारी विज्ञान को कैसे लागू किया जाता है, इसकी व्याख्या करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""},{"level":"5","name":"","description":"","lang-hi-name":"","lang-hi-description":""}]

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands referral identification and management","description":"Understands referral identification
-Understands the needs of referral
-Understands referral management
-Understands   stablisation   methods   prior   to transport of neonates
-Understands the importance of stabilisation methods before transportation of patients including neonates","lang-hi-name":"रेफरल की पहचान और प्रबंधन को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"रेफरल की पहचान और प्रबंधन को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands referral counselling and support","description":"Understands referral counselling
-Comprehends referral support
-Understands pre-referral protocols
-Understands prevention protocols for hypothermia, hypoglycaemia and hypoxia in neonates
-Understands the pre-requisites of a referral
-Understands the role of nurses in making referrals","lang-hi-name":"रेफरल परामर्श और सहयोग को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"रेफरल परामर्श और सहयोग को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Identifies need for referral","description":"Identifies indications for referral
-Identifies   different   pre-referral   management techniques
-Provides pre referral management as per protocols","lang-hi-name":"रेफरल की आवश्यकता की पहचान करती है","lang-hi-description":"रेफरल की आवश्यकता की पहचान करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Councels the patient, the attendants (family members) and stablises the patient","description":"Providing the counselling to the client and family members for the need and importance of referral.
- Commencing the referral process.
- Maintains the warm chain for neonates.
- Stabilises the patient prior to transportaion (including neonates)","lang-hi-name":"रोगी, परिचारकों (परिवार के सदस्यों) को सलाह देती है और रोगी को स्थिर करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगी, परिचारकों (परिवार के सदस्यों) को सलाह देती है और रोगी को स्थिर करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Refers patients to higher facility","description":"Refers the patient to appropriate facility by using the free of cost referral transportation provided by the Government.
-Communicates to the client and family members about neonate transportation
- Providing proper documentation and reports as pre-referral management procedure.
- Ensure the medical support including the life support equipments and essential drugs during the transportation with proper and appropriate instructions to the family members and EMT’s
-Organises referral of the client to the appropriate facility
-Manages back referrals                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             ","lang-hi-name":"रोगियों को उच्च स्वास्थ्य केंद्र रेफर करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगियों को उच्च स्वास्थ्य केंद्र रेफर करती है"}]

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands supplements and nutritional requirements","description":"Understands various supplements available
-Understands the importance and need for supplements
-Understands the side effects of certain supplements
-Recognises the nutritional requirements of mother (MIYCN)
-Recognises the nutritional requirement of newborns (EIBF, Iron/folate, dietary, safe drinking water and hygiene)","lang-hi-name":"पूरक आहार और पोषण संबंधी आवश्यकताओं को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"पूरक आहार और पोषण संबंधी आवश्यकताओं को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Interprets dosage as per condition","description":"Interprets dosage requirement for supplements based on condition
-Understands  the  duration  of  intake  for  all supplements
-Interprets the dosage requirement of nutritional measures
-Understands the duration of intake and other nutritional measures","lang-hi-name":"स्थिति के अनुसार खुराक की व्याख्या करती है","lang-hi-description":"स्थिति के अनुसार खुराक की व्याख्या करती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Calculates intake and prepares plans","description":"Prepares    and    updates    intake    plans    of supplements for each beneficiary
-Calculates the intake of supplements for each beneficiary
-Classifies                 and                 differentiates underweight/SAM/MAM children","lang-hi-name":"सेवन की गणना करती है और योजना तैयार करती है","lang-hi-description":"सेवन की गणना करती है और योजना तैयार करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Administers supplements and counsels for nutrition","description":"Administers supplements to mothers
-Administers supplements to children
-Counsels the mother and family on dietary intake, food preparation, supplements intake, sanitation, etc","lang-hi-name":"पूरक आहार देती है और पोषण संबंधी सलाह देती है","lang-hi-description":"पूरक आहार देती है और पोषण संबंधी सलाह देती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Conducts follow-up care","description":"Schedules  visits  for  nutrition  and  shares  plan with mother and family members
-Conducts home visits with mothers and family members

additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands protocols for Surgical handwashing and PPE donning-doffing","description":"Understands the importance of disinfection of OT and pre-op ward
-Understands   the   Chemicals   in   appropriate strenghth used for disinfection of OT
-Recognises  the  cleaning  protocols  of  tables, trolleys, lights and other equipments of OT","lang-hi-name":"सर्जिकल हाथ धोने और पीपीई पहनने के प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"सर्जिकल हाथ धोने और पीपीई पहनने के प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands the protocols for disinfecting OT and its equipments","description":"Understands the importance of Surgical hand- washing
-Knows the steps of surgical hand-washing
-Knows the steps of PPE Donning-Doffing","lang-hi-name":"ओटी और उसके उपकरणों के कीटाणुशोधन के प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"ओटी और उसके उपकरणों के कीटाणुशोधन के प्रोटोकॉल को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Understands sterilisation of instruments and lenins","description":"Understands the importance of sterilization of OT and equipments
-Understands the Chemicals in appropriate strenghth used for sterilization of OT
-Recognises the sterilization protocols for OT equipments
-Understands the importance of sterilization of lenin and instruments
-Knows the various methods of physical and chemical sterilization of lenins and instruments
-Knows how to wrap instruments, linen and operate autoclave","lang-hi-name":"उपकरणों और लेनिन के स्टरिलाइजेशन को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"उपकरणों और लेनिन के स्टरिलाइजेशन को समझती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Performs handwashing, OT disinfection and sterilisation","description":"Performs surgical hand-washing and Donning- Doffing of PPE

-Performs  OT  sterilization  periodically as  per protocol
-Packs and sterilizes lenin and instruments in autoclave","lang-hi-name":"हाथ धोती है, ओटी कीटाणुशोधन करती है और स्टरिलाइज करती है","lang-hi-description":"हाथ धोती है, ओटी कीटाणुशोधन करती है और स्टरिलाइज करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Supervises other staff on OT protocols and maintains OT","description":"Ensures that entire surgical adheres to the handwashing and donning-doffing of PPE protocol

-Recognises    the    safe    surgical    and    safe anaesthesia checklist","lang-hi-name":"ऑपरेशन के दौरान प्रबंधन को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"ऑपरेशन के दौरान प्रबंधन को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Understands post-op care","description":"Understands the protocols of immediate care after surgery (keeping wound clean & dry, managing swelling etc.)

-Understands systemic and pulmonary circulation","lang-hi-name":"रक्त परिसंचरण प्रणाली को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"रक्त परिसंचरण प्रणाली को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Understands signs and symptoms of diseases","description":"Understands the signs and symptoms associated with disease and disorders of Cardio-vascular system (eg- CAD, Arrythmia, Valvular heart disease, Inflammation and infections, Cardiac emergencies, Vascular disorders, Venous disorders)
-Understands the signs and  symptoms associated with Hematological disorders (eg- Anaemia, Thalassemia, Polycythemia, Leukemia, Lymphomas, Bleeding disorders, coagulopathies etc.)
-Understands functions of heart and vascular system","lang-hi-name":"रोगों के संकेतों और लक्षणों को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगों के संकेतों और लक्षणों को समझती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Understands assessment","description":"Knows the various examinations and diagnostic tests conducted for cardio-vascular diseases and disorders
-Knows the various examinations and diagnostic tests conducted for hemotological diseases and disorders
-Knows the normal range of various blood components","lang-hi-name":"जांच को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"जांच को समझती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Conducts assessment and identifies disease","description":"Conducts assessments and investigations (history, physical examination) to identify cardio-vascular diseases and disorders

-Identifies hematological diseases and disorders based upon history, examination and diagnostic tests","lang-hi-name":"आकलन करती है और बीमारी की पहचान करती है","lang-hi-description":"आकलन करती है और बीमारी की पहचान करती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Manages patient","description":"Provides nursing care, medical care for cardio-vascular diseases and disorders
-Assists in giving alternate therapies as per doctor's prescription for cardio-vascular diseases and disorders
-Provides nursing care, medical care for hematological diseases and disorders
-Assists in giving alternate therapies as per doctor's prescription for hematological diseases and disorders","lang-hi-name":"रोगी का प्रबंधन करती है","lang-hi-description":"रोगी का प्रबंधन करती है"}]

-Understand the growth and development of adolescents

additionalProperties.lang-hi-description: पूरक आहार और पोषण
additionalProperties.competencyLevelDescription:
[{"level":"1","name":"Understands supplements and nutritional requirements","description":"Understands various supplements available
-Understands the importance and need for supplements
-Understands the side effects of certain supplements
-Recognises the nutritional requirements of mother (MIYCN)
-Recognises the nutritional requirement of newborns (EIBF, Iron/folate, dietary, safe drinking water and hygiene)","lang-hi-name":"पूरक आहार और पोषण संबंधी आवश्यकताओं को समझती है","lang-hi-description":"पूरक आहार और पोषण संबंधी आवश्यकताओं को समझती है"},{"level":"2","name":"Interprets dosage as per condition","description":"Interprets dosage requirement for supplements based on condition
-Understands  the  duration  of  intake  for  all supplements
-Interprets the dosage requirement of nutritional measures
-Understands the duration of intake and other nutritional measures","lang-hi-name":"स्थिति के अनुसार खुराक की व्याख्या करती है","lang-hi-description":"स्थिति के अनुसार खुराक की व्याख्या करती है"},{"level":"3","name":"Calculates intake and prepares plans","description":"Prepares    and    updates    intake    plans    of supplements for each beneficiary
-Calculates the intake of supplements for each beneficiary
-Classifies                 and                 differentiates underweight/SAM/MAM children","lang-hi-name":"सेवन की गणना करती है और योजना तैयार करती है","lang-hi-description":"सेवन की गणना करती है और योजना तैयार करती है"},{"level":"4","name":"Administers supplements and counsels for nutrition","description":"Administers supplements to mothers
-Administers supplements to children
-Counsels the mother and family on dietary intake, food preparation, supplements intake, sanitation, etc","lang-hi-name":"पूरक आहार देती है और पोषण संबंधी सलाह देती है","lang-hi-description":"पूरक आहार देती है और पोषण संबंधी सलाह देती है"},{"level":"5","name":"Conducts follow-up care","description":"Schedules  visits  for  nutrition  and  shares  plan with mother and family members
-Conducts home visits with mothers and family members
